960522Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string QuoteSnippetStringCStyle(string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // CS1647: An expression is too long or complex to compile near '...'Di2015NewLine    // happens if number of line wraps is too many (335440 is max for x64, 926240 is max for x86)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // CS1034: Compiler limit exceeded: Line cannot exceed 16777214 charactersDi2015NewLine    // theoretically every character could be escaped unicode (6 chars), plus quotes, etc.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int LineWrapWidth = (16777214/6) - 4;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder(value.Length+5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    b.Append("\\r\\n\\"");Di2015NewLine    for (int i=0; i<value.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \switch (value[i])Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\case '\\u2028':Di2015NewLine    \\case '\\u2029':Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\int ch = (int)value[i];Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append(@"\\u");Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append(ch.ToString("X4", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));Di2015NewLine    \\\break;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\case '\\\\':Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append(@"\\\\");Di2015NewLine    \\\break;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\case '\\'':Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append(@"\\'");Di2015NewLine    \\\break;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\case '\\t':Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append(@"\\t");Di2015NewLine    \\\break;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\case '\\n':Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append(@"\\n");Di2015NewLine    \\\break;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\case '\\r':Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append(@"\\r");Di2015NewLine    \\\break;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\case '"':Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append("\\\\\\"");Di2015NewLine    \\\break;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\case '\\0':Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append(@"\\0");Di2015NewLine    \\\break;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\default:Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append(value[i]);Di2015NewLine    \\\break;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \if ((i > 0) && ((i % LineWrapWidth) == 0))Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\if ((Char.IsHighSurrogate(value[i]) && (i < (value.Length - 1))) && Char.IsLowSurrogate(value[i + 1]))Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\b.Append(value[++i]);Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\b.Append("\\"+\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    \\b.Append('"');Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    b.Append("\\"");Di2015NewLine    return b.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

961925Di2015UniqueSeparatordelegate(float[] inout)Di2015NewLine{ // My Original CodeDi2015NewLine    float[][] tempbuf = new float[2][];Di2015NewLine    int length = inout.Length / 2;Di2015NewLine    for (int c = 0; c < 2; c++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tempbuf[c] = new float[length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0, offset = c; i < tempbuf[c].Length; i++, offset += 2)Di2015NewLine            tempbuf[c][i] = inout[offset];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinedelegate(float[] inout)Di2015NewLine{ // jerryjvl's recommendation: loop unrollingDi2015NewLine    float[][] tempbuf = new float[2][];Di2015NewLine    int length = inout.Length / 2;Di2015NewLine    for (int c = 0; c < 2; c++)Di2015NewLine        tempbuf[c] = new float[length];Di2015NewLine    for (int ix = 0, i = 0; ix < length; ix++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tempbuf[0][ix] = inout[i++];Di2015NewLine        tempbuf[1][ix] = inout[i++];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinedelegate(float[] inout)Di2015NewLine{ // Unsafe CodeDi2015NewLine    unsafeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float[][] tempbuf = new float[2][];Di2015NewLine        int length = inout.Length / 2;Di2015NewLine        fixed (float* buffer = inout)Di2015NewLine            for (int c = 0; i < length; i++, offset += 2)Di2015NewLine                        *p++ = *offset;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinedelegate(float[] inout)Di2015NewLine{ // Modifying my original code to see if the compiler is not as smart as i think it is.Di2015NewLine    float[][] tempbuf = new float[2][];Di2015NewLine    int length = inout.Length / 2;Di2015NewLine    for (int c = 0; 963099Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class VolumeControl : UserControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Using a DependencyProperty backing store for Angle.Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty AngleProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("Angle", typeof(double), typeof(VolumeControl), new UIPropertyMetadata(0.0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double AngleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (double)GetValue(AngleProperty); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue(AngleProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public VolumeControl()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        this.MouseLeftButtonDown += new MouseButtonEventHandler(OnMouseLeftButtonDown);Di2015NewLine        this.MouseUp += new MouseButtonEventHandler(OnMouseUp);Di2015NewLine        this.MouseMove += new MouseEventHandler(OnMouseMove);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnMouseLeftButtonDown(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Mouse.Capture(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnMouseUp(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Mouse.Capture(null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnMouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Mouse.Captured == this)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the current mouse position relative to the volume controlDi2015NewLine            Point currentLocation = Mouse.GetPosition(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // We want to rotate around the center of the knob, not the top cornerDi2015NewLine            Point knobCenter = new Point(this.ActualHeight / 2, this.ActualWidth / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Calculate an angleDi2015NewLine            double radians = Math.Atan((currentLocation.Y - knobCenter.Y) / Di2015NewLine                                       (currentLocation.X - knobCenter.X));Di2015NewLine            this.Angle = radians * 180 / Math.PI;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Apply a 180 degree shift when X is negative so that we can rotateDi2015NewLine            // all of the way aroundDi2015NewLine            if (currentLocation.X - knobCenter.X < 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.Angle += 180;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

963755Di2015UniqueSeparator    // sample dataDi2015NewLine    var data = new[] {Di2015NewLine        new { Foo = 1, Bar = "Don Smith"},Di2015NewLine        new { Foo = 1, Bar = "Mike Jones"},Di2015NewLine        new { Foo = 1, Bar = "James Ray"},Di2015NewLine        new { Foo = 2, Bar = "Tom Rizzo"},Di2015NewLine        new { Foo = 2, Bar = "Alex Homes"},Di2015NewLine        new { Foo = 3, Bar = "Andy Bates"},Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    // group into columns, and select the rows per columnDi2015NewLine    var grps = from d in dataDi2015NewLine              group d by d.FooDi2015NewLine              into grpDi2015NewLine              select new {Di2015NewLine                  Foo = grp.Key,Di2015NewLine                  Bars = grp.Select(d2 => d2.Bar).ToArray()Di2015NewLine              };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // find the total number of (data) rowsDi2015NewLine    int rows = grps.Max(grp => grp.Bars.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // output columnsDi2015NewLine    foreach (var grp in grps) {Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(grp.Foo + "\\t");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    // output dataDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < rows; i++) {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var grp in grps) {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write((i < grp.Bars.Length ? grp.Bars[i] : null) + "\\t");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

964341Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string text;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int itemId;Di2015NewLine    private readonly string path;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Foo(string text, int itemId, string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.text = text;Di2015NewLine        this.itemId = itemId;Di2015NewLine        this.path = path;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string TextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return text; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ItemIdDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return itemId; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string PathDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return path; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Foo otherFoo = other as Foo;Di2015NewLine        if (otherFoo == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return EqualityComparer<string>.Default.Equals(text, otherFoo.text) &&Di2015NewLine        return EqualityComparer<int>.Default.Equals(itemId, otherFoo.itemId) &&Di2015NewLine        return EqualityComparer<string>.Default.Equals(path, otherFoo.path);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("{{ Text={0}, ItemId={1}, Path={2} }}",Di2015NewLine                             text, itemId, path);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hash = 17;Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 23 + EqualityComparer<string>.Default.GetHashCode(text);Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 23 + EqualityComparer<int>.Default.GetHashCode(itemId);Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 23 + EqualityComparer<string>.Default.GetHashCode(path);Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

965613Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void AssertPermissions(IEnumerable<string> rolesDemanded)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IList<IIdentity> identities = OperationContext.Current.ServiceSecurityContext.AuthorizationContext.Properties["Identities"] as IList<IIdentity>;Di2015NewLine    if (identities == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new SecurityException("Unauthenticated access. 968980Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool FileEquals(string fileName1, string fileName2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Check the file size and CRC equality here.. if they are equal...    Di2015NewLine    using (var file1 = new FileStream(fileName1, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine        using (var file2 = new FileStream(fileName2, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine            return StreamEquals(file1, file2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic bool StreamEquals(Stream stream1, Stream stream2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int bufferSize = 2048;Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer1 = new byte[bufferSize]; //buffer sizeDi2015NewLine    byte[] buffer2 = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine    while (true) {Di2015NewLine        int count1 = stream1.Read(buffer1, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine        int count2 = stream2.Read(buffer2, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (count1 != count2)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (count1 == 0)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // You might replace the following with an efficient "memcmp"Di2015NewLine        if (!buffer1.Take(count1).SequenceEqual(buffer2.Take(count2)))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

976674Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic const string LowerCaseAlphabet = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwyxz";Di2015NewLinepublic const string UpperCaseAlphabet = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string GenerateUpperCaseString(int size, Random rng)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GenerateString(size, rng, UpperCaseAlphabet);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string GenerateLowerCaseString(int size, Random rng)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GenerateString(size, rng, LowerCaseAlphabet);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string GenerateString(int size, Random rng, string alphabet)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] chars = new char[size];Di2015NewLine    for (int i=0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        chars[i] = alphabet[rng.Next(alphabet.Length)];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new string(chars);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

977112Di2015UniqueSeparator    [AttributeUsage( AttributeTargets.Class | AttributeTargets.Method, Inherited = true, AllowMultiple = false )]Di2015NewLine    public class MasterEventAuthorizationAttribute : AuthorizeAttributeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The name of the master page or view to use when rendering the view on authorization failure.  DefaultDi2015NewLine        /// is null, indicating to use the master page of the specified view.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public virtual string MasterName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The name of the view to render on authorization failure.  Default is "Error".Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public virtual string ViewName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MasterEventAuthorizationAttribute()Di2015NewLine            : base()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.ViewName = "Error";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected void CacheValidateHandler( HttpContext context, object data, ref HttpValidationStatus validationStatus )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            validationStatus = OnCacheAuthorization( new HttpContextWrapper( context ) );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void OnAuthorization( AuthorizationContext filterContext )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (filterContext == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException( "filterContext" );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (AuthorizeCore( filterContext.HttpContext ))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SetCachePolicy( filterContext );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (!filterContext.HttpContext.User.Identity.IsAuthenticated)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // auth failed, redirect to login pageDi2015NewLine                filterContext.Result = new HttpUnauthorizedResult();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (filterContext.HttpContext.User.IsInRole( "SuperUser" ))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // is authenticated and is in the SuperUser roleDi2015NewLine                SetCachePolicy( filterContext );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ViewDataDictionary viewData = new ViewDataDictionary();Di2015NewLine                viewData.Add( "Message", "You do not have sufficient privileges for this operation." );Di2015NewLine                filterContext.Result = new ViewResult { MasterName = this.MasterName, ViewName = this.ViewName, ViewData = viewData };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected void SetCachePolicy( AuthorizationContext filterContext )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // ** IMPORTANT **Di2015NewLine            // Since we're performing authorization at the action level, the authorization code runsDi2015NewLine            // after the output caching module. In the worst case this could allow an authorized userDi2015NewLine            // to cause the page to be cached, then an unauthorized user would later be served theDi2015NewLine            // cached page. We work around this by telling proxies not to cache the sensitive page,Di2015NewLine            // then we hook our custom authorization code into the caching mechanism so that we haveDi2015NewLine            // the final say on whether a page should be served from the cache.Di2015NewLine            HttpCachePolicyBase cachePolicy = filterContext.HttpContext.Response.Cache;Di2015NewLine            cachePolicy.SetProxyMaxAge( new TimeSpan( 0 ) );Di2015NewLine            cachePolicy.AddValidationCallback( CacheValidateHandler, null /* data */);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

977501Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace Guessing_GameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine        private static int randomNumber;Di2015NewLine        private const int rangeNumberMin = 1;Di2015NewLine        private const int rangeNumberMax = 10;Di2015NewLine        private const int maxGuesses = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int GenerateNumber(int min,int max)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLine            return random.Next(min, max);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void btnOk_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int yourNumber = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Int32.TryParse(textBox1.Text.Trim(), out yourNumber) &&Di2015NewLine               yourNumber>= rangeNumberMin && yourNumber<=rangeNumberMax)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                listBox1.Items.Add(yourNumber);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (yourNumber > randomNumber)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    listBox2.Items.Add("No the Magic Number is lower than your number");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (yourNumber < randomNumber)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    listBox2.Items.Add("No, the Magic Number is higher than your number");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine were more than 5 guessesDi2015NewLine                if(listBox1.Items.Count >= maxGuesses && yourNumber != randomNumber)Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    listBox2.Items.Add("You are out of guesses!");Di2015NewLine                    textBox1.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine                    btnOk.Enable = false;Di2015NewLine                    btnRestart.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Please enter a number between " + rangeNumberMin + " to " + rangeNumberMax);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void btnRestart_Click(object sender, EventArgs = qry.BuildSqlStatement();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var c in qry.Constraints)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (c.Comparison == result = result.Replace(c.ParameterName, GetFormattedValue(c.ParameterValue, c.DbType));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Works for MySQLDi2015NewLine    private static readonly String formatter_date = "'{0:yyyy-MM-dd}'";Di2015NewLine    private 984836Di2015UniqueSeparatorTextRange FindWordFromPosition(TextPointer position, string word)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (position != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (position.GetPointerContext(LogicalDirection.Forward) == TextPointerContext.Text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string textRun = position.GetTextInRun(LogicalDirection.Forward);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Find the starting index of any substring that matches "word".Di2015NewLine            int indexInRun = textRun.IndexOf(word);Di2015NewLine            if (indexInRun >= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TextPointer start = position.GetPositionAtOffset(indexInRun);Di2015NewLine                TextPointer end = start.GetPositionAtOffset(word.Length);Di2015NewLine                return new TextRange(start, end);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        position = position.GetNextContextPosition(LogicalDirection.Forward);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // position will be null if "word" is not found.Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

986617Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Report {Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int ProjectId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        Report a = new Report { Id = 1, ProjectId = 13 },Di2015NewLine            b = new Report { Id = 1, ProjectId = 13 },Di2015NewLine            c = new Report { Id = 1, ProjectId = 12 };Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(PropertyCompare.Equal(a, b));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(PropertyCompare.Equal(a, c));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic class PropertyCompare {Di2015NewLine    public static bool Equal<T>(T x, T y) {Di2015NewLine        return Cache<T>.Compare(x, y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static class Cache<T> {Di2015NewLine        internal static readonly Func<T, T, bool> Compare;Di2015NewLine        static Cache() {Di2015NewLine            var props = typeof(T).GetProperties();Di2015NewLine            if (props.Length == 0) {Di2015NewLine                Compare = delegate { return true; };Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var x = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "x");Di2015NewLine            var y = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "y");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Expression body = null;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < props.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine                var propEqual = Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Property(x, props[i]),Di2015NewLine                    Expression.Property(y, props[i]));Di2015NewLine                if (body == null) {Di2015NewLine                    body = propEqual;Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    body = Expression.AndAlso(body, propEqual);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Compare = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, T, bool>>(body, x, y)Di2015NewLine                          .Compile();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
986617Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class MemberCompareDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool Equal<T>(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Cache<T>.Compare(x, y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static class Cache<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        internal static readonly Func<T, T, bool> Compare;Di2015NewLine        static Cache()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var members = typeof(T).GetProperties(Di2015NewLine                BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public)Di2015NewLine                .Cast<MemberInfo>().Concat(typeof(T).GetFields(Di2015NewLine                BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public)Di2015NewLine                .Cast<MemberInfo>());Di2015NewLine            var x (FieldInfo)member),Di2015NewLine                            Expression.Field(y, (FieldInfo)member));Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case                Expression.Property(y, (PropertyInfo)member));Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        throw new 989603Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid AutomateExcelExample()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Excel.Application excelApp = new Excel.Application();Di2015NewLine    excelApp.Visible = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Excel.Workbook workbook = excelApp.Workbooks.Add(Type.Missing);Di2015NewLine    Excel.Worksheet worksheet = (Excel.Worksheet)workbook.Worksheets[1];Di2015NewLine    Excel.Range range = worksheet.get_Range("A1", Type.Missing);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    range.set_Value(Type.Missing, "Hello World");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("Intentional pause so you can see the result.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Cleanup:Di2015NewLine    GC.Collect();Di2015NewLine    GC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Marshal.FinalReleaseComObject(range);Di2015NewLine    Marshal.FinalReleaseComObject(worksheet);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    workbook.Close(false, Type.Missing, Type.Missing);Di2015NewLine    Marshal.FinalReleaseComObject(workbook);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    excelApp.Quit();Di2015NewLine    Marshal.FinalReleaseComObject(excelApp);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
989646Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.ObjectModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace CopyCollection {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  class CFoo {Di2015NewLine    public int Key;Di2015NewLine    public string Name;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  class MyKeyedCollection : KeyedCollection<int, CFoo> {Di2015NewLine    public MyKeyedCollection() : base(null, 10) { }Di2015NewLine    protected override int GetKeyForItem(CFoo foo) {Di2015NewLine      return foo.Key;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  class MyObject {Di2015NewLine    public MyKeyedCollection kc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Copy constructorDi2015NewLine    public MyObject(MyObject that) {Di2015NewLine      this.kc = new MyKeyedCollection();Di2015NewLine      if (that != null) {Di2015NewLine        CollectionTools.CopyKeyedCollection<int, CFoo>(that.kc, this.kc);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  class Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      MyObject mobj1 = new MyObject(null);Di2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; i < 7; ++i)Di2015NewLine        mobj1.kc.Add(new CFoo() { Key = i, Name = i.ToString() });Di2015NewLine      // Copy mobj1Di2015NewLine      MyObject mobj2 = new MyObject(mobj1);Di2015NewLine      // add a bunch more items to mobj2Di2015NewLine      for (int i = 8; i < 712324; ++i)Di2015NewLine        mobj2.kc.Add(new CFoo() { Key = i, Name = i.ToString() });Di2015NewLine      // copy mobj2Di2015NewLine      MyObject mobj3 = new MyObject(mobj2);Di2015NewLine      // put a breakpoint after here, and look at mobj's and see that it worked!Di2015NewLine      // you can delete stuff out of mobj1 or mobj2 and see the items still in mobj3,Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static class CollectionTools {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe static KeyedCollection<TKey, TValue> CopyKeyedCollection<TKey, TValue>(Di2015NewLine     KeyedCollection<TKey, TValue> src, Di2015NewLine     KeyedCollection<TKey, TValue> dst) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      object osrc = src;Di2015NewLine      // pointer to a structure that is a template for the instance variables Di2015NewLine      // of KeyedCollection<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine      TKeyedCollection* psrc = (TKeyedCollection*)(*((int*)&psrc + 1));  Di2015NewLine      object odst = dst;Di2015NewLine      TKeyedCollection* pdst = (TKeyedCollection*)(*((int*)&pdst + 1));Di2015NewLine      object srcObj = null;Di2015NewLine      object dstObj = null;Di2015NewLine      int* i = (int*)&i;  // helps me find the stackDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      i[2] = (int)psrc->_01_items;Di2015NewLine      dstObj = CopyList<TValue>(srcObj as List<TValue>);Di2015NewLine      pdst->_01_items = (uint)i[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // there is no dictionary if the # items < thresholdDi2015NewLine      if (psrc->_04_dict != 0) {Di2015NewLine        i[2] = (int)psrc->_04_dict;Di2015NewLine        dstObj = CopyDict<TKey, TValue>(srcObj as Dictionary<TKey, TValue>);Di2015NewLine        pdst->_04_dict = (uint)i[1];Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      pdst->_03_comparer = psrc->_03_comparer;Di2015NewLine      pdst->_05_keyCount = psrc->_05_keyCount;Di2015NewLine      pdst->_06_threshold = psrc->_06_threshold;Di2015NewLine      return dst;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe static List<TValue> CopyList<TValue>(Di2015NewLine     List<TValue> src) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      object osrc = src;Di2015NewLine      // pointer to a structure that is a template for Di2015NewLine      // the instance variables of List<>Di2015NewLine      TList* psrc = (TList*)(*((int*)&psrc + 1));  Di2015NewLine      object srcArray = null;Di2015NewLine      object dstArray = null;Di2015NewLine      int* i = (int*)&i;  // helps me find things on stackDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      i[2] = (int)psrc->_01_items;Di2015NewLine      int capacity = (srcArray as Array).Length;Di2015NewLine      List<TValue> dst = new List<TValue>(capacity);Di2015NewLine      TList* pdst = (TList*)(*((int*)&pdst + 1));Di2015NewLine      i[1] = (int)pdst->_01_items;Di2015NewLine      Array.Copy(srcArray as Array, dstArray as Array, capacity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      pdst->_03_size = psrc->_03_size;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return dst;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe static Dictionary<TKey, TValue> CopyDict<TKey, TValue>(Di2015NewLine     Dictionary<TKey, TValue> src) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      object osrc = src;Di2015NewLine      // pointer to a structure that is a template for the instance Di2015NewLine      // variables of Dictionary<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine      TDictionary* psrc = (TDictionary*)(*((int*)&psrc + 1)); Di2015NewLine      object srcArray = null;Di2015NewLine      object dstArray = null;Di2015NewLine      int* i = (int*)&i;  // helps me find the stackDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      i[2] = (int)psrc->_01_buckets;Di2015NewLine      int capacity = (srcArray as Array).Length;Di2015NewLine      Dictionary<TKey, TValue> dst = new Dictionary<TKey, TValue>(capacity);Di2015NewLine      TDictionary* pdst = (TDictionary*)(*((int*)&pdst + 1));Di2015NewLine      i[1] = (int)pdst->_01_buckets;Di2015NewLine      Array.Copy(srcArray as Array, dstArray as Array, capacity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      i[2] = (int)psrc->_02_entries;Di2015NewLine      i[1] = (int)pdst->_02_entries;Di2015NewLine      Array.Copy(srcArray as Array, dstArray as Array, capacity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      pdst->_03_comparer = psrc->_03_comparer;Di2015NewLine      pdst->_04_m_siInfo = psrc->_04_m_siInfo;Di2015NewLine      pdst->_08_count = psrc->_08_count;Di2015NewLine      pdst->_10_freeList = psrc->_10_freeList;Di2015NewLine      pdst->_11_freeCount = psrc->_11_freeCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return dst;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // these are the structs that map to the private variables in the classesDi2015NewLine    // i use uint for classes, since they are just pointersDi2015NewLine    // statics and constants are not in the instance data.Di2015NewLine    // I used the memory dump of visual studio to get these mapped right.Di2015NewLine    // everything with a * I copy.  I Used RedGate reflector to look through allDi2015NewLine    // the code to decide what needed to be copied.Di2015NewLine    struct TKeyedCollection {Di2015NewLine      public uint _00_MethodInfo;                  // pointer to cool type infoDi2015NewLine      // CollectionDi2015NewLine      public uint _01_items;                       // * IList<T>Di2015NewLine      public uint _02_syncRoot;                    //   objectDi2015NewLine      // KeyedCollectionDi2015NewLine      public uint _03_comparer;                    //   IEqualityComparer<TKey> Di2015NewLine      public uint _04_dict;                        // * Dictionary<TKey, TItem> Di2015NewLine      public int _05_keyCount;                     // *Di2015NewLine      public int _06_threshold;                    // *Di2015NewLine      // const int defaultThreshold = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    struct TList {Di2015NewLine      public uint _00_MethodInfo;                   //Di2015NewLine      public uint _01_items;                        // * T[] Di2015NewLine      public uint _02_syncRoot;                     //   objectDi2015NewLine      public int _03_size;                          // *Di2015NewLine      public int _04_version;                       //Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    struct TDictionary {Di2015NewLine      // FieldsDi2015NewLine      public uint _00_MethodInfo;                   //Di2015NewLine      public uint _01_buckets;                     // * int[] Di2015NewLine      public uint _02_entries;                     // * Entry<TKey, TValue>[] Di2015NewLine      public uint _03_comparer;                    //   IEqualityComparer<TKey> Di2015NewLine      public uint _04_m_siInfo;                    //   SerializationInfoDi2015NewLine      public uint _05__syncRoot;                   //   object Di2015NewLine      public uint _06_keys;                        //   KeyCollection<TKey, TValue> Di2015NewLine      public uint _07_values;                      //   ValueCollection<TKey, TValue> Di2015NewLine      public int _08_count;                        // *Di2015NewLine      public int _09_version;Di2015NewLine      public int _10_freeList;                     // * Di2015NewLine      public int _11_freeCount;                    // *Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
989694Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ContainedInList(IEnumerable<T> list, T value, IEqualityComparer<T> comparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach(T element in list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (comparer.Equals(element, value))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

992412Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CatalogBinder: System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override Type BindToType (string assemblyName, string typeName) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        // get the 'fully qualified (ie inc namespace) type name' into an arrayDi2015NewLine        string[] typeInfo = typeName.Split('.');Di2015NewLine        // because the last item is the class name, which we're going to Di2015NewLine        // 'look for' in *this* namespace/assemblyDi2015NewLine        string className=typeInfo[typeInfo.Length -1];Di2015NewLine        if (className.Equals("Catalog"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return typeof (Catalog);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (className.Equals("Word"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return typeof (Word);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (className.Equals("File"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return typeof (File);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {    // pass back exactly what was passed in!Di2015NewLine            return Type.GetType(string.Format( "{0}, {1}", typeName, Di2015NewLine                                assemblyName));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

995037Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TextBoxEx : TextBoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TextBoxEx()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AddHandler(LostFocusEvent,Di2015NewLine          new RoutedEventHandler(CallConverter), true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Type SourceTypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (Type)GetValue(SourceTypeProperty); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue(SourceTypeProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Using a DependencyProperty as the backing store for SourceType.  This enables animation, styling, binding, etc...Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty SourceTypeProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("SourceType", typeof(Type), typeof(TextBoxEx), new UIPropertyMetadata(null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void CallConverter(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextBoxEx textBoxEx = sender as TextBoxEx;Di2015NewLine        if (textBoxEx.Style == null) {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (textBoxEx.SourceType == null) {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (Setter setter in textBoxEx.Style.Setters) {Di2015NewLine            if (setter.Property.ToString() == "Text") {Di2015NewLine                if (! (setter.Value is Binding) ) {Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Binding binding = setter.Value as Binding;Di2015NewLine                if (binding.Converter == null) {Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                object value = binding.Converter.ConvertBack(textBoxEx.Text, textBoxEx.SourceType, binding.ConverterParameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture);Di2015NewLine                value = binding.Converter.Convert(value, typeof(string), binding.ConverterParameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture);Di2015NewLine                if (!(value is string)) {Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                textBoxEx.Text = (string)value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1001452Di2015UniqueSeparatorProcess[] processes = Process.GetProcesses();Di2015NewLinestring thisProcess = Process.GetCurrentProcess().MainModule.FileName;Di2015NewLinestring thisProcessName = Process.GetCurrentProcess().ProcessName;Di2015NewLineforeach (Process process in processes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // Compare process name, this will weed out most processesDi2015NewLine   if (thisProcessName.CompareTo(process.ProcessName) != 0) continue;Di2015NewLine   // Check the file name of the processes main moduleDi2015NewLine   if (thisProcess.CompareTo(process.MainModule.FileName) != 0) continue;Di2015NewLine   if (Process.GetCurrentProcess().Id == process.Id) Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine     // We don't want to commit suicideDi2015NewLine     continue;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   // Tell the other instance to dieDi2015NewLine   Win32.SendMessage(process.MainWindowHandle, Win32.WM_CLOSE, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1002672Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static MachineType GetDllMachineType(string dllPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //see http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/system/platform/firmware/PECOFF.mspxDi2015NewLine      //offset to PE header is always at 0x3CDi2015NewLine      //PE header starts with "PE\\0\\0" =  0x50 0x45 0x00 0x00Di2015NewLine      //followed by 2-byte machine type field (see document above for enum)Di2015NewLine      FileStream fs = new FileStream(dllPath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine      BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(fs);Di2015NewLine      fs.Seek(0x3c, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine      Int32 peOffset = br.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLine      fs.Seek(peOffset, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine      UInt32 peHead = br.ReadUInt32();Di2015NewLine      if(peHead!=0x00004550) // "PE\\0\\0", little-endianDi2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Can't find PE header");       Di2015NewLine      MachineType machineType = (MachineType) br.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLine      br.Close();Di2015NewLine      fs.Close();Di2015NewLine      return machineType;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1002873Di2015UniqueSeparator//...Di2015NewLineif (searchTerms.Count() > 1)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> remainingSearchTerms = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 1; x < searchTerms.Count(); x++)Di2015NewLine    \remainingSearchTerms.Add(searchTerms[x]);Di2015NewLine    List<SearchResult> matchingResults = new List<SearchResult>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (SearchResult result in allResults)Di2015NewLine    \if (MatchSearchTerms(new string[] { result.Name, result.Number, result.id.ToString() }, remainingSearchTerms.ToArray()))Di2015NewLine    \\matchingResults.Add(result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return matchingResults.OrderBy(x => x.Name).Take(MaxResults).ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine    return allResults.OrderBy(x => x.Name).Take(MaxResults).ToList();Di2015NewLine//...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool MatchSearchTerms(string[] searchFields, string[] searchTerms)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool match = true;Di2015NewLine    foreach (string searchTerm in searchTerms)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \if (match)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\bool fieldMatch = false;Di2015NewLine    \\foreach (string field in searchFields)Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\if (field.ToLower().Contains(searchTerm.ToLower()))Di2015NewLine    \\\{Di2015NewLine    \\\\fieldMatch = true; //Only one field needs to match the termDi2015NewLine    \\\\break;Di2015NewLine    \\\}Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\match = fieldMatch;Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    \elseDi2015NewLine    \\break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return match;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1003010Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic String[] split(String text) {Di2015NewLine    if (text == null) {Di2015NewLine        text = "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int last_match = 0;Di2015NewLine    LinkedList<String> splitted = new LinkedList<String>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Matcher m = this.pattern.matcher(text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Iterate trough each matchDi2015NewLine    while (m.find()) {Di2015NewLine        // Text since last matchDi2015NewLine        splitted.add(text.substring(last_match,m.start()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The delimiter itselfDi2015NewLine        if (this.keep_delimiters) {Di2015NewLine            splitted.add(m.group());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        last_match = m.end();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Trailing textDi2015NewLine    splitted.add(text.substring(last_match));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return splitted.toArray(new String[splitted.size()]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1003080Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IMessageDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void Process(object source);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass LoginMessage : IMessageDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Process(object source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineabstract class MessageProcessorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public abstract void ProcessMessage(object source, object type);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MessageProcessor<T> : MessageProcessor where T: IMessageDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void ProcessMessage(object source, object o) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!(o is T)) {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ProcessMessage(source, (T)o);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ProcessMessage(object source, T type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        type.Process(source);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<Type, MessageProcessor> messageProcessors = new Dictionary<Type, MessageProcessor>();Di2015NewLine        messageProcessors.Add(typeof(string), new MessageProcessor<LoginMessage>());Di2015NewLine        LoginMessage message = new LoginMessage();Di2015NewLine        Type key = message.GetType();Di2015NewLine        MessageProcessor processor = messageProcessors[key];Di2015NewLine        object source = null;Di2015NewLine        processor.ProcessMessage(source, message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1005217Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class GuessingGameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Random _RNG = new Random();Di2015NewLine    private bool _GameRunning;Di2015NewLine    private bool _GameWon;Di2015NewLine    private int _Number;Di2015NewLine    private int _GuessesRemaining;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GuessesRemainingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \get { return _GuessesRemaining; 1005815Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic const int GW_HWNDNEXT = 2; // The next window is below the specified windowDi2015NewLinepublic const int GW_HWNDPREV = 3; // The previous window is aboveDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLinestatic extern IntPtr GetTopWindow(IntPtr hWnd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine[return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern bool IsWindowVisible(IntPtr hWnd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto, EntryPoint = "GetWindow", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern IntPtr GetNextWindow(IntPtr hwnd, [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U4)] int wFlag);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Searches for the topmost visible form of your app in all the forms opened in the current Windows session.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="hWnd_mainFrm">Handle of the main form</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>The Form that is currently TopMost, or null</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static Form GetTopMostWindow(IntPtr hWnd_mainFrm)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Form frm = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IntPtr hwnd = GetTopWindow((IntPtr)null);Di2015NewLine    if (hwnd != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while ((!IsWindowVisible(hwnd) || frm == null) && hwnd != hWnd_mainFrm)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get next window under the current handlerDi2015NewLine            hwnd = GetNextWindow(hwnd, GW_HWNDNEXT);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                frm = (Form)Form.FromHandle(hwnd);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Weird behaviour: In some cases, trying to cast to a Form a handle of an object Di2015NewLine                // that isn't a form will just return null. In other cases, will throw an exception.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return frm;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1007254Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void ResizeLogo(string originalFilename, string resizeFilename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Image imgOriginal = Image.FromFile(originalFilename);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //pass in whatever value you want for the width (180)Di2015NewLine    Image imgActual = ScaleBySize(imgOriginal, 180);Di2015NewLine    imgActual.Save(resizeFilename);Di2015NewLine    imgActual.Dispose();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Image ScaleBySize(Image imgPhoto, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int logoSize = size;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float sourceWidth = imgPhoto.Width;Di2015NewLine    float sourceHeight = imgPhoto.Height;Di2015NewLine    float destHeight = 0;Di2015NewLine    float destWidth = 0;Di2015NewLine    int sourceX = 0;Di2015NewLine    int sourceY = 0;Di2015NewLine    int destX = 0;Di2015NewLine    int destY = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Resize Image to have the height = logoSize/2 or width = logoSize.Di2015NewLine    // Height is greater than width, set Height = logoSize and resize width accordinglyDi2015NewLine    if (sourceWidth > (2 * sourceHeight))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        destWidth = logoSize;Di2015NewLine        destHeight = (float)(sourceHeight * logoSize / sourceWidth);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int h = logoSize / 2;Di2015NewLine        destHeight = h;Di2015NewLine        destWidth = (float)(sourceWidth * h / sourceHeight);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Width is greater than height, set Width = logoSize and resize height accordinglyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Bitmap bmPhoto = new Bitmap((int)destWidth, (int)destHeight, Di2015NewLine                                PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb);Di2015NewLine    bmPhoto.SetResolution(imgPhoto.HorizontalResolution, imgPhoto.VerticalResolution);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Graphics grPhoto = Graphics.FromImage(bmPhoto);Di2015NewLine    grPhoto.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    grPhoto.DrawImage(imgPhoto,Di2015NewLine        new Rectangle(destX, destY, (int)destWidth, (int)destHeight),Di2015NewLine        new Rectangle(sourceX, sourceY, (int)sourceWidth, (int)sourceHeight),Di2015NewLine        GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    grPhoto.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return bmPhoto;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1013362Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum OperationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    And,Di2015NewLine    OrDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class QueryObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Type Type { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Operation Operation { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic override IEnumerable<T> SelectQuery(Dictionary<string, QueryObject> dictionary)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string t = Convert.ToString(typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLine    string criteria = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    foreach (KeyValuePair<string, QueryObject> item in dictionary)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(criteria))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (item.Value.Operation)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case Operation.And:Di2015NewLine                    criteria += " and ";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case Operation.Or:Di2015NewLine                    criteria += " or ";Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (item.Value.Type == typeof(int))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            criteria += item.Key + " = " + item.Value + " ";    Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            criteria += item.Key + " = '" + item.Value + "'";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string query = " from " + t;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (criteria != string.Empty)Di2015NewLine        query += " where " + criteria;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return FindByHql(query);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1015939Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace LFU {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class LFUCache<TKey,TValue> {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Dictionary<TKey, LinkedListNode<CacheNode>> cache = new Dictionary<TKey, LinkedListNode<CacheNode>>();Di2015NewLine        LinkedList<CacheNode> lfuList = new LinkedList<CacheNode>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        class CacheNode {Di2015NewLine            public TKey Key { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public TValue Data { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public int UseCount { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int size;Di2015NewLine        int age = 0;Di2015NewLine        int agePolicy;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public LFUCache(int size) : this(size, 1000) {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="size"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="agePolicy">after this number of gets the cache will take 1 off all UseCounts, forcing old stuff to expire.</param>Di2015NewLine        public LFUCache(int size, int agePolicy) {Di2015NewLine            this.agePolicy = 1000;Di2015NewLine            this.size = size;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Add(TKey key, TValue val) {Di2015NewLine            TValue existing;Di2015NewLine            if (!TryGet(key, out existing)) {Di2015NewLine                var node = new CacheNode() {Key = key, Data = val, UseCount = 1};Di2015NewLine                if (lfuList.Count == size) {Di2015NewLine                    cache.Remove(lfuList.First.Value.Key);Di2015NewLine                    lfuList.RemoveFirst();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var insertionPoint = Nodes.LastOrDefault(n => n.Value.UseCount < 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                LinkedListNode<CacheNode> inserted; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (insertionPoint == null) {Di2015NewLine                    inserted = lfuList.AddFirst(node);Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    inserted = lfuList.AddAfter(insertionPoint, node);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                cache[key] = inserted;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable<LinkedListNode<CacheNode>> Nodes {Di2015NewLine            get {Di2015NewLine                var node = lfuList.First;Di2015NewLine                while (node != null) {Di2015NewLine                    yield return node;Di2015NewLine                    node = node.Next;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable<LinkedListNode<CacheNode>> IterateFrom(LinkedListNode<CacheNode> node) {Di2015NewLine            while (node != null) {Di2015NewLine                yield return node;Di2015NewLine                node = node.Next;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public TValue GetOrDefault(TKey key) {Di2015NewLine            TValue val;Di2015NewLine            TryGet(key, out val);Di2015NewLine            return val;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool TryGet(TKey key, out TValue val) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            age++;Di2015NewLine            if (age > agePolicy) {Di2015NewLine                age = 0;Di2015NewLine                foreach (var node in cache.Values) {Di2015NewLine                    var v = node.Value;Di2015NewLine                    v.UseCount--;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            LinkedListNode<CacheNode> data;Di2015NewLine            bool success = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (cache.TryGetValue(key, out data)) {Di2015NewLine                var cacheNode = data.Value;Di2015NewLine                val = cacheNode.Data;Di2015NewLine                cacheNode.UseCount++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var insertionPoint = IterateFrom(data).Last(n => n.Value.UseCount <=  cacheNode.UseCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (insertionPoint != data) {Di2015NewLine                    lfuList.Remove(data);Di2015NewLine                    lfuList.AddAfter(insertionPoint, data);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                val = default(TValue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return success;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static 1017900Di2015UniqueSeparator<?phpDi2015NewLine$password = "pa55w0rd";Di2015NewLine$key = HexToBytes("AE09F72B007CAAB5"); // 8 bytes, hexDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// $to must be 'UTF-16LE'Di2015NewLine// $from depends on the "source" of $passwordDi2015NewLine$data = mb_convert_encoding($password, 'UTF-16LE', 'ASCII');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// I've saved this script as an ascii file -> the string literal is ASCII encodedDi2015NewLine// therefore php's strlen() returns 8 for $password and 16 for $dataDi2015NewLine// this may differ in your case, e.g. if the contents of $password comes from aDi2015NewLine// http-request where the data is utf-8 encoded. 1020819Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Bitmap CaptureCursor(ref int x, ref int y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Win32Stuff.CURSORINFO cursorInfo = new Win32Stuff.CURSORINFO();Di2015NewLine  cursorInfo.cbSize = Marshal.SizeOf(cursorInfo);Di2015NewLine  if (!Win32Stuff.GetCursorInfo(out cursorInfo))Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (cursorInfo.flags != Win32Stuff.CURSOR_SHOWING)Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  IntPtr hicon = Win32Stuff.CopyIcon(cursorInfo.hCursor);Di2015NewLine  if (hicon == IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Win32Stuff.ICONINFO iconInfo;Di2015NewLine  if (!Win32Stuff.GetIconInfo(hicon, out iconInfo))Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  x = cursorInfo.ptScreenPos.x - ((int)iconInfo.xHotspot);Di2015NewLine  y = cursorInfo.ptScreenPos.y - ((int)iconInfo.yHotspot);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  using (Bitmap maskBitmap = Bitmap.FromHbitmap(iconInfo.hbmMask))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Is this a monochrome cursor?Di2015NewLine    if (maskBitmap.Height == maskBitmap.Width * 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Bitmap resultBitmap = new Bitmap(maskBitmap.Width, maskBitmap.Width);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Graphics desktopGraphics = Graphics.FromHwnd(Win32Stuff.GetDesktopWindow());Di2015NewLine      IntPtr desktopHdc = desktopGraphics.GetHdc();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      IntPtr maskHdc = Win32Stuff.CreateCompatibleDC(desktopHdc);Di2015NewLine      IntPtr oldPtr = Win32Stuff.SelectObject(maskHdc, maskBitmap.GetHbitmap());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      using (Graphics resultGraphics = Graphics.FromImage(resultBitmap))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr resultHdc = resultGraphics.GetHdc();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // These two operation will result in a black cursor over a white background.Di2015NewLine        // Later in the code, a call to MakeTransparent() will get rid of the white background.Di2015NewLine        Win32Stuff.BitBlt(resultHdc, 0, 0, 32, 32, maskHdc, 0, 32, Win32Stuff.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCCOPY);Di2015NewLine        Win32Stuff.BitBlt(resultHdc, 0, 0, 32, 32, maskHdc, 0, 0, Win32Stuff.TernaryRasterOperations.SRCINVERT);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        resultGraphics.ReleaseHdc(resultHdc);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      IntPtr newPtr = Win32Stuff.SelectObject(maskHdc, oldPtr);Di2015NewLine      Win32Stuff.DeleteDC(newPtr);Di2015NewLine      Win32Stuff.DeleteDC(maskHdc);Di2015NewLine      desktopGraphics.ReleaseHdc(desktopHdc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Remove the white background from the BitBlt calls,Di2015NewLine      // resulting in a black cursor over a transparent background.Di2015NewLine      resultBitmap.MakeTransparent(Color.White);Di2015NewLine      return resultBitmap;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Icon icon = Icon.FromHandle(hicon);Di2015NewLine  return icon.ToBitmap();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1028267Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ShellButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (CurrentSelectedSite == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AlertSelectSite();Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SystemViewPanel systemSelectPanel = ShowPanel<SystemViewPanel>(this, CurrentSelectedSite.Systems);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine    I decided that this since this panel is used quickly, I'd rather Di2015NewLine    keep the flow of what's happening in the same place. The lineDi2015NewLine    above shows the panel, a double click later, and I'm back to doingDi2015NewLine    what the ShellButton does. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    I've exposed a SystemSelected event, which just wraps the panel's Di2015NewLine    SystemsListBox.DoubleClick event.*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    systemSelectPanel.SystemSelected += delegate(object s, EventArgs eArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ListBox p = (ListBox)s;Di2015NewLine        System system = (System)p.SelectedItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (system != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Process shell = new Process();Di2015NewLine            shell.StartInfo = new ProcessStartInfo("cmd.exe",Di2015NewLine            String.Format(@"/K psexec.exe \\\\{0} -u {1} -p {2} cmd.exe", system.IpAddress, CurrentSelectedSite.RemoteAccess.UserName, CurrentSelectedSite.RemoteAccess.DecryptedPassword));Di2015NewLine            shell.StartInfo.WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.Normal;Di2015NewLine            shell.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            shell.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.Controls.Remove(p.Parent);Di2015NewLine        p.Parent.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        this.SearchPanel.BringToFront();Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1034331Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static byte[] StripOleHeader(byte[] fileData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const string START_BLOCK = "%PDF-1.3";Di2015NewLine        int startPos = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Encoding u8 = Encoding.UTF7;Di2015NewLine        string strEncoding = u8.GetString(fileData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (strEncoding.IndexOf(START_BLOCK) != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            startPos = strEncoding.IndexOf(START_BLOCK);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (startPos == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Could not find PDF Header");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] retByte = new byte[fileData.LongLength - startPos];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Array.Copy(fileData, startPos, retByte, 0, fileData.LongLength - startPos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return retByte;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1034383Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Print(List<Uri> ListToBePrinted)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    XpsDocumentWriter writer =Di2015NewLine        PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter(this.SelectedPrinter.PrintQueue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PrintCapabilities printerCapabilities =Di2015NewLine        this.SelectedPrinter.PrintQueue.GetPrintCapabilities();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Size PrintableImageSize =Di2015NewLine        new Size(printerCapabilities.PageImageableArea.ExtentWidth,Di2015NewLine                 printerCapabilities.PageImageableArea.ExtentHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Uri aUri in ListToBePrinted)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DrawingVisual drawVisual = new DrawingVisual();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ImageBrush imageBrush = new ImageBrush();Di2015NewLine        imageBrush.ImageSource = new BitmapImage(aUri);Di2015NewLine        imageBrush.Stretch = Stretch.Fill;Di2015NewLine        imageBrush.TileMode = TileMode.None;Di2015NewLine        imageBrush.AlignmentX = AlignmentX.Center;Di2015NewLine        imageBrush.AlignmentY = AlignmentY.Center;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (DrawingContext drawingContext = drawVisual.RenderOpen())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Flips along X and Y axis (flips and mirrors)Di2015NewLine            drawingContext.PushTransform(new ScaleTransform(-1, 1, PrintableImageSize.Width / 2, PrintableImageSize.Height / 2));Di2015NewLine            drawingContext.PushTransform(new RotateTransform(180, PrintableImageSize.Width / 2, PrintableImageSize.Height / 2)); // Rotates 180 degreeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            drawingContext.DrawRectangle(imageBrush, null, new Rect(25, -25, PrintableImageSize.Width, PrintableImageSize.Height));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        writer.Write(drawVisual);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1035000Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    struct ProcessStartTimePairDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Process Process { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public DateTime StartTime { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public DateTime ExitTimeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return DateTime.Now; // approximate valueDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ProcessStartTimePair(Process p) : this()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Process = p;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StartTime = p.StartTime;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StartTime = DateTime.Now; // approximate valueDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<ProcessStartTimePair> knownProcesses = new List<ProcessStartTimePair>();Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Process p in Process.GetProcesses())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!knownProcesses.Select(x => x.Process.Id).Contains(p.Id))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    knownProcesses.Add(new ProcessStartTimePair(p));Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Detected new process: " + p.ProcessName);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < knownProcesses.Count; i++) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ProcessStartTimePair pair = knownProcesses[i];Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (pair.Process.HasExited)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine(pair.Process.ProcessName + " has exited (alive from {0} to {1}).", pair.StartTime.ToString(), pair.ExitTime.ToString());Di2015NewLine                        knownProcesses.Remove(pair);Di2015NewLine                        i--; // List was modified, 1 item lessDi2015NewLine                        // TODO: Store in the info in the databaseDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Would have to check whether the process still exists in Process.GetProcesses().Di2015NewLine                    // The process probably is a system process.Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1035000Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<ProcessStartTimePair> knownProcesses = new List<ProcessStartTimePair>();Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Process p in Process.GetProcesses())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!ProcessIsKnown(knownProcesses, p.Id))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    knownProcesses.Add(new ProcessStartTimePair(p));Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Detected new process: " + p.ProcessName);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < knownProcesses.Count; i++) Di2015NewLine            [...]Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static bool ProcessIsKnown(List<ProcessStartTimePair> knownProcesses, int ID)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (ProcessStartTimePair pstp in knownProcesses)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (pstp.Process.Id == ID)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1037606Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Submits a request to the specified url and returns the text response, or string.Empty if the request failed.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="uri">The url to submit the request to.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The text response from the specified url, or string.Empty if the request failed.</returns>Di2015NewLine    protected string getPageResponse(string url)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //set the default resultDi2015NewLine        string responseText = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //create a request targetting the urlDi2015NewLine        System.Net.WebRequest request = System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine        //set the credentials of the requestDi2015NewLine        request.Credentials = System.Net.CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get the response from the requestDi2015NewLine        System.Net.HttpWebResponse response = (System.Net.HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        //get the response code (format it as a decimal)Di2015NewLine        string statusCode = response.StatusCode.ToString("d");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //only continue if we had a succesful response (2XX or 3XX)Di2015NewLine        if (statusCode.StartsWith("2") || statusCode.StartsWith("3"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //get the response stream so we can read itDi2015NewLine            Stream responseStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine            //create a stream reader to read the responseDi2015NewLine            StreamReader responseReader = new StreamReader(responseStream);Di2015NewLine            //read the response text (this should be javascript)Di2015NewLine            responseText = responseReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //return the response text of the requestDi2015NewLine        return responseText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1040629Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport("advapi32.dll", CharSet=CharSet.Auto, SetLastError=true)]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern bool LookupAccountName([In,MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPTStr)] string systemName, [In,MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPTStr)] string accountName, IntPtr sid, ref int cbSid, StringBuilder referencedDomainName, ref int cbReferencedDomainName, out int use);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("advapi32.dll", CharSet=CharSet.Auto, SetLastError=true)]Di2015NewLineinternal static extern bool ConvertSidToStringSid(IntPtr sid, [In,Out,MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPTStr)] ref string pStringSid);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>The method converts object name (user, group) into SID string.</summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="name">Object name in form domain\\object_name.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>SID string.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static string GetSid(string name) {Di2015NewLine    IntPtr _sid = IntPtr.Zero; //pointer to binary form of SID string.Di2015NewLine    int _sidLength = 0;   //size of SID buffer.Di2015NewLine    int _domainLength = 0;  //size of domain name buffer.Di2015NewLine    int _use;     //type of object.Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder _domain = new StringBuilder(); //stringBuilder for domain name.Di2015NewLine    int _error = 0;Di2015NewLine    string _sidString = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //first call of the function only returns the sizes of buffers (SDI, domain name)Di2015NewLine    LookupAccountName(null, name, _sid, ref _sidLength, _domain, ref _domainLength, out _use);Di2015NewLine    _error = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (_error != 122) //error 122 (The data area passed to a system call is too small) - normal behaviour.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw (new Exception(new Win32Exception(_error).Message));Di2015NewLine    } else {Di2015NewLine        _domain = new StringBuilder(_domainLength); //allocates memory for domain nameDi2015NewLine        _sid = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(_sidLength); //allocates memory for SIDDi2015NewLine        bool _rc = LookupAccountName(null, name, _sid, ref _sidLength, _domain, ref _domainLength, out _use);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_rc == false) {Di2015NewLine            _error = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeHGlobal(_sid);Di2015NewLine            throw (new Exception(new Win32Exception(_error).Message));Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            // converts binary SID into stringDi2015NewLine            _rc = ConvertSidToStringSid(_sid, ref _sidString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_rc == false) {Di2015NewLine                _error = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLine                Marshal.FreeHGlobal(_sid);Di2015NewLine                throw (new Exception(new Win32Exception(_error).Message));Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                Marshal.FreeHGlobal(_sid);Di2015NewLine                return _sidString;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1041007Di2015UniqueSeparator// get the entities that have been inserted or modifiedDi2015NewLinevar projects = myObjectContext.ObjectStateManager.GetObjectStateEntries(Di2015NewLine     EntityState.Added | EntityState.Modified).Where(Di2015NewLine          x => x.Entity is Project).Select( x=> (Project) x.Entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get existing entities, exclude those that are being modifiedDi2015NewLinevar projects2 = myObjectContext.Projects.Where(Di2015NewLine     BuildDoesntContainExpression<Project, int>(z => z.ProjectId, Di2015NewLine          projects.Select(x => x.ProjectId)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Union the 2 setsDi2015NewLinevar projects3 = projects.Union(projects2);Di2015NewLine
1041007Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static Expression<Func<TElement, bool>> BuildDoesntContainExpression<TElement, TValue>(    Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<TElement, TValue>> valueSelector, IEnumerable<TValue> values)Di2015NewLine    {    Di2015NewLine        if (null == valueSelector) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("valueSelector"); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (null == values) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("values"); Di2015NewLine        }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ParameterExpression p = valueSelector.Parameters.Single();    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // p => valueSelector(p) == values[0] || valueSelector(p) == ... Di2015NewLine        if (!values.Any())    Di2015NewLine        {        Di2015NewLine            return e => false;    Di2015NewLine        }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var equals = values.Select(Di2015NewLine            value => (Expression)Expression.NotEqual(valueSelector.Body, Expression.Constant(value, typeof(TValue))));    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var body = equals.Aggregate<Expression>((accumulate, equal) => Expression.And(accumulate, equal));    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TElement, bool>>(body, p);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine

will generate the .XSL fileDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//---Retrieve the Report from SQL, drop into DataSet, then Bind() it to a DataGridDi2015NewLineSqlConnection conn = new "/").ToString() + "';", conn);Di2015NewLinecmd1.SelectCommand.CommandType = CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLineDataSet dsReports = new DataSet("tblReporting");Di2015NewLinecmd1.Fill(dsReports);Di2015NewLineconn.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDataGrid dtaFinal = new DataGrid();Di2015NewLinedtaFinal.DataSource = dsReports.Tables[0];Di2015NewLinedtaFinal.DataBind();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedtaFinal.HeaderStyle.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.White;Di2015NewLinedtaFinal.HeaderStyle.BackColor = System.Drawing.Color.AliceBlue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//---Create the File---------Di2015NewLineResponse.Buffer = true;Di2015NewLineResponse.ClearContent();Di2015NewLineResponse.ClearHeaders();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//---For PDF uncomment the following lines----------Di2015NewLine//Response.ContentType = "application/pdf";Di2015NewLine//Response.AddHeader("content-disposition", "attachment;filename=FileName.pdf");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//---For MS Excel uncomment the following lines----------Di2015NewLine//Response.ContentType = "application/vnd.ms-excel";Di2015NewLine//Response.AddHeader("content-disposition", "attachment;filename=FileName.xls");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//---For MS Word uncomment the following lines----------Di2015NewLine//Response.ContentType = "application/vnd.word";Di2015NewLine//Response.AddHeader("content-disposition", "attachment;filename=FileName.doc");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//---For CSV uncomment the following lines----------Di2015NewLine//Response.ContentType = "text/csv";Di2015NewLine//Response.AddHeader("content-disposition", "attachment;filename=FileName.csv");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//---For TXT uncomment the following lines----------Di2015NewLine//Response.ContentType = "text/plain";Di2015NewLine//Response.AddHeader("content-disposition", "attachment;filename=FileName.txt");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnableViewState = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineStringWriter sw = new StringWriter();Di2015NewLineHtmlTextWriter hw = new HtmlTextWriter(sw);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//---Renders the DataGrid and then dumps it into the HtmlTextWriter ControlDi2015NewLinedtaFinal.RenderControl(hw);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//---Utilize
