1041759Di2015UniqueSeparator  //construct a query to fetch the row/column shaped results.Di2015NewLinevar query = Di2015NewLine  from m in db.mapDi2015NewLine  //where m.... ?Di2015NewLine  let a = m.AgencyDi2015NewLine  let b = m.BusinessUnitDi2015NewLine  let c = m.ClientDi2015NewLine  // where something about a or b or c ?Di2015NewLine  select new {Di2015NewLine    AgencyID = a.AgencyID,Di2015NewLine    AgencyName = a.Name,Di2015NewLine    BusinessUnitID = b.BusinessUnitID,Di2015NewLine    ClientID = c.ClientID,Di2015NewLine    NumberOfAccounts = c.NumberOfAccounts,Di2015NewLine    Score = c.ScoreDi2015NewLine  };Di2015NewLine  //hit the databaseDi2015NewLinevar rawRecords = query.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  //shape the results further into a hierarchy.    Di2015NewLineList<Agency> results = rawRecordsDi2015NewLine  .GroupBy(x => x.AgencyID)Di2015NewLine  .Select(g => new Agency()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Name = g.First().AgencyName,Di2015NewLine    BusinessUnits = gDi2015NewLine    .GroupBy(y => y.BusinessUnitID)Di2015NewLine    .Select(g2 => new BusinessUnit()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Clients = g2Di2015NewLine      .Select(z => new Client()Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        NumberOfAccounts = z.NumberOfAccounts,Di2015NewLine        Score = z.ScoreDi2015NewLine      })Di2015NewLine    })Di2015NewLine  })Di2015NewLine  .ToList();Di2015NewLine

1043204Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string HtmlReplace(string value, Dictionary<string, string>Di2015NewLine    definitions, Func<string, string, string> htmlWrapper)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder(value.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int index = -1;Di2015NewLine    int lastEndIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    KeyValuePair<string, string> def;Di2015NewLine    while ((index = IndexOf(value, definitions, lastEndIndex,Di2015NewLine        StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase, out def)) != -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(value.Substring(lastEndIndex, index - lastEndIndex));Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(htmlWrapper(def.Key, def.Value));Di2015NewLine        lastEndIndex = index + def.Key.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(value.Substring(lastEndIndex, value.Length - lastEndIndex));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int IndexOf(string text, Dictionary<string, string> values, int startIndex,Di2015NewLine    StringComparison comparisonType, out KeyValuePair<string, string> foundEntry)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var minEntry = default(KeyValuePair<string, string>);Di2015NewLine    int minIndex = -1;Di2015NewLine    int index;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var entry in values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (((index = text.IndexOf(entry.Key, startIndex, comparisonType)) < minIndexDi2015NewLine            && index != -1) || minIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            minIndex = index;Di2015NewLine            minEntry = entry;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foundEntry = minEntry;Di2015NewLine    return minIndex;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1044821Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DateTime AddBusinessDays(DateTime date, int days)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (days == 0) return date;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (date.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        date = date.AddDays(2);Di2015NewLine        days -= 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (date.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        date = date.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLine        days -= 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    date = date.AddDays(days / 5 * 7);Di2015NewLine    int extraDays = days % 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((int)date.DayOfWeek + extraDays > 5)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        extraDays += 2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return date.AddDays(extraDays);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1044821Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetBusinessDays(DateTime start, DateTime end)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (start.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        start = start.AddDays(2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (start.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        start = start.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (end.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        end = end.AddDays(-1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (end.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        end = end.AddDays(-2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int diff = (int)end.Subtract(start).TotalDays;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int result = diff / 7 * 5 + diff % 7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (end.DayOfWeek < start.DayOfWeek)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return result - 2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else{Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1045894Di2015UniqueSeparatordef draw(element, parentScreenX, parentScreenY):Di2015NewLine    # Draw this element relative to its parentDi2015NewLine    screenX = parentScreenX + element.localXDi2015NewLine    screenY = parentScreenY + element.localY    Di2015NewLine    render(element, screenX, screenY)Di2015NewLine    # Draw each child relative to this oneDi2015NewLine    for childElement in element.children:Di2015NewLine        draw(childElement, screenX, screenY)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# Normal usage (root element should be at 0,0, Di2015NewLine# and typically just an invisible container.)Di2015NewLinedraw(rootElement, 0, 0)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine# Slightly different mathematics for the mouseover test,Di2015NewLine# but that's just personal preferenceDi2015NewLinedef elementAtPos(element, posX, posY):Di2015NewLine    # Translate that space to element local spaceDi2015NewLine    posX -= element.localXDi2015NewLine    posY -= element.localYDi2015NewLine    # Compare against this element's dimensionsDi2015NewLine    if (posX, posY) is within (0, 0, element.width, element.height):Di2015NewLine        # it's within this element - now check childrenDi2015NewLine        for childElement in element.children:Di2015NewLine            # Do this same check on the child element (and its children, etc)Di2015NewLine            targetedChildElement = elementAtPos(childElement, posX, posY) Di2015NewLine            if targetedChildElement is not None:Di2015NewLine                return targetedChildElementDi2015NewLine        # it wasn't within any of our descendants so return this oneDi2015NewLine        return element Di2015NewLine    # It wasn't within our bounds at all, so return NoneDi2015NewLine    return NoneDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#Normal usageDi2015NewLinetargetedElement = elementAtPos(rootElement, mouseScreenX, mouseScreenY)Di2015NewLine
1045894Di2015UniqueSeparatordef screen_position(element):Di2015NewLine    if element.parent is not None:Di2015NewLine        (parentLocalX, parentLocalY) = screen_position(element.parent)Di2015NewLine    else:Di2015NewLine        (parentLocalX, parentLocalY) = (0,0)Di2015NewLine    return (element.localX + parentLocalX, element.localY + parentLocalY)Di2015NewLine

           Console.WriteLine(stopwatch.Elapsed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ((prefixes.Count <= 50) && (calls.Count <= 50))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<String> GeneratePrefixes(Int32 1047594Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;    Di2015NewLinepublic class CSVReaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string ESCAPE_SPLIT_REGEX = "({1}[^{1}]*{1})*(?<Separator>{0})({1}[^{1}]*{1})*";Di2015NewLine    private string[] FieldNames;Di2015NewLine    private List<string[]> Records;Di2015NewLine    private int ReadIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CSVReader(string File)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Records = new List<string[]>();Di2015NewLine        string[] Record = null;Di2015NewLine        StreamReader Reader = new StreamReader(File);Di2015NewLine        int Index = 0;Di2015NewLine        bool BlankRecord = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FieldNames = GetEscapedSVs(Reader.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine        while (!Reader.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Record = GetEscapedSVs(Reader.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine            BlankRecord = true;Di2015NewLine            for (Index = 0; Index <= Record.Length - 1; Index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Record[Index])) BlankRecord = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!BlankRecord) Records.Add(Record);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ReadIndex = -1;Di2015NewLine        Reader.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string[] GetEscapedSVs(string Data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetEscapedSVs(Data, ",", "\\"");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private string[] GetEscapedSVs(string Data, string Separator, string Escape)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] Result = null;Di2015NewLine        int Index = 0;Di2015NewLine        int PriorMatchIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        MatchCollection Matches = Regex.Matches(Data, string.Format(ESCAPE_SPLIT_REGEX, Separator, Escape));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Result = new string[Matches.Count];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (Index = 0; Index <= Result.Length - 2; Index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Result[Index] = Data.Substring(PriorMatchIndex, Matches[Index].Groups["Separator"].Index - PriorMatchIndex);Di2015NewLine            PriorMatchIndex = Matches[Index].Groups["Separator"].Index + Separator.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Result[Result.Length - 1] = Data.Substring(PriorMatchIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (Index = 0; Index <= Result.Length - 1; Index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Regex.IsMatch(Result[Index], string.Format("^{0}[^{0}].*[^{0}]{0}$", Escape))) Result[Index] = Result[Index].Substring(1, Result[Index].Length - 2);Di2015NewLine            Result[Index] = Result[Index].Replace(Escape + Escape, Escape);Di2015NewLine            if (Result[Index] == null) Result[Index] = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int FieldCountDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return FieldNames.Length; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetString(int Index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Records[ReadIndex][Index];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetName(int Index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return FieldNames[Index];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Read()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ReadIndex = ReadIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine        return ReadIndex < Records.Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DisplayResults(DataGridView DataView)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataGridViewColumn col = default(DataGridViewColumn);Di2015NewLine        DataGridViewRow row = default(DataGridViewRow);Di2015NewLine        DataGridViewCell cell = default(DataGridViewCell);Di2015NewLine        DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell header = default(DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell);Di2015NewLine        int Index = 0;Di2015NewLine        ReadIndex = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataView.Rows.Clear();Di2015NewLine        DataView.Columns.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (Index = 0; Index <= FieldCount - 1; Index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            col = new DataGridViewColumn();Di2015NewLine            col.CellTemplate = new DataGridViewTextBoxCell();Di2015NewLine            header = new DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell();Di2015NewLine            header.Value = GetName(Index);Di2015NewLine            col.HeaderCell = header;Di2015NewLine            DataView.Columns.Add(col);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            row = new DataGridViewRow();Di2015NewLine            for (Index = 0; Index <= FieldCount - 1; Index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cell = new DataGridViewTextBoxCell();Di2015NewLine                cell.Value = GetString(Index).ToString();Di2015NewLine                row.Cells.Add(cell);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            DataView.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

<summary>Class to monitor devices.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public class MediaEventDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region VariablesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*------------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine        private string m_logicalDrive;Di2015NewLine        private ManagementEventWatcher m_managementEventWatcher = null;Di2015NewLine        /*------------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region EventsDi2015NewLine        /*------------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine        public event MediaWatcherEventHandler MediaWatcher;Di2015NewLine        /*------------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region EnumsDi2015NewLine    = 4,Di2015NewLine          CompactDisk     = 5,Di2015NewLine          RamDisk         = 6Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>The drive status.</summary>Di2015NewLine        public enum DriveStatusDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          Unknown  = -1,Di2015NewLine          Ejected  = 0,Di2015NewLine          Inserted = 1,Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine       #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       #region MonitoringDi2015NewLine       /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine       /// <summary>Starts the monitoring of device.</summary>Di2015NewLine       /// <param name="path"></param>Di2015NewLine       /// <param name="mediaEvent"></param>Di2015NewLine       public void Monitor( string path, MediaEvent mediaEvent ) Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           if( null == mediaEvent ) Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              throw new ArgumentException( "Media event cannot be null!" );Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           //In case same class was called make sure only one instance is runningDi2015NewLine           /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine           this.Exit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           //Keep logica drive to checkDi2015NewLine           /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine           this.m_logicalDrive = this.GetLogicalDrive( path );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           WqlEventQuery wql;Di2015NewLine           ManagementOperationObserver observer = new ManagementOperationObserver();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           //Bind to local machineDi2015NewLine           /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine           ConnectionOptions opt = new ConnectionOptions();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           //Sets required privilegeDi2015NewLine           /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine           opt.EnablePrivileges = true;Di2015NewLine           ManagementScope scope = new ManagementScope( "root\\\\CIMV2", opt );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           try Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              wql = new WqlEventQuery();Di2015NewLine              wql.EventClassName = "__InstanceModificationEvent";Di2015NewLine              wql.WithinInterval = new TimeSpan( 0, 0, 1 );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              wql.Condition = String.Format( @"TargetInstance ISA 'Win32_LogicalDisk' and TargetInstance.DeviceId = '{0}'", this.m_logicalDrive );Di2015NewLine              this.m_managementEventWatcher = new ManagementEventWatcher( scope, wql );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              //Register async. event handlerDi2015NewLine              /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine              this.m_managementEventWatcher.EventArrived += new EventArrivedEventHandler( mediaEvent.MediaEventArrived );Di2015NewLine              this.m_managementEventWatcher.Start();Di2015NewLine           } Di2015NewLine           catch( Exception e ) Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              this.Exit();Di2015NewLine              throw new Exception( "Media Check: "  + e.Message );Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       /// <summary>Stops the monitoring of device.</summary>Di2015NewLine       public void Exit( ) Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine             //In case same class was called make sure only one instance is runningDi2015NewLine             /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine             if( null != this.m_managementEventWatcher ) Di2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                  try Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                       this.m_managementEventWatcher.Stop();Di2015NewLine                       this.m_managementEventWatcher = null;Di2015NewLine                  } Di2015NewLine                  catch {}Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region HelpersDi2015NewLine        /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private DriveStatus m_driveStatus = DriveStatus.Unknown;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Triggers the event when change on device occured.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="sender"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="e"></param>Di2015NewLine        private void MediaEventArrived( object sender, EventArrivedEventArgs e ) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the Event object and display itDi2015NewLine            PropertyData pd = e.NewEvent.Properties["TargetInstance"];Di2015NewLine            DriveStatus driveStatus = this.m_driveStatus;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( pd != null ) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ManagementBaseObject mbo = pd.Value as ManagementBaseObject;Di2015NewLine                System.IO.DriveInfo info = new System.IO.DriveInfo( (string)mbo.Properties["DeviceID"].Value );Di2015NewLine                driveStatus = info.IsReady ? DriveStatus.Inserted : DriveStatus.Ejected;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if( driveStatus != this.m_driveStatus )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.m_driveStatus = driveStatus;Di2015NewLine                if( null != MediaWatcher ) Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MediaWatcher( sender, driveStatus );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Gets the logical drive of a given path.</summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="path"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private string GetLogicalDrive( string path ) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.IO.DirectoryInfo dirInfo = new System.IO.DirectoryInfo( path );Di2015NewLine            string root = dirInfo.Root.FullName;Di2015NewLine            string logicalDrive = root.Remove(root.IndexOf(System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar ) );Di2015NewLine            return logicalDrive;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1054087Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLinepublic static string GetRandomHexNumber(int digits)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[digits / 2];Di2015NewLine    random.NextBytes(buffer);Di2015NewLine    string result = String.Concat(buffer.Select(x => x.ToString("X2")).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    if (digits % 2 == 0)Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    return result + random.Next(16).ToString("X");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1060647Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Principal;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace BR.UtilDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic class StartupLinkUtilDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("shell32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    static extern bool SHGetSpecialFolderPath(IntPtr hwndOwner, [Out] StringBuilder lpszPath, int nFolder, bool fCreate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string getAllUsersStartupFolder()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder path = new StringBuilder(200);Di2015NewLine        SHGetSpecialFolderPath(IntPtr.Zero, path, CSIDL_COMMON_STARTUP, false);Di2015NewLine        return path.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string getStartupShortcutFilename()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Path.Combine(getAllUsersStartupFolder(), Application.ProductName) + ".lnk";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public static bool CopyShortcutToAllUsersStartupFolder(string pShortcutName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool retVal = false;Di2015NewLine        FileInfo shortcutFile = new FileInfo(pShortcutName);Di2015NewLine        FileInfo destination = new FileInfo(getStartupShortcutFilename());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (destination.Exists)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Don't do anything file already exists.  -- Potentially overwrite?Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (!shortcutFile.Exists)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("Unable to RunOnStartup because '" + pShortcutName + "' can't be found.  Was this application installed properly?");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            retVal = copyFile(shortcutFile, destination);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return retVal;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool doesShortcutExistInAllUsersStartupFolder()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return File.Exists(getStartupShortcutFilename());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool RemoveShortcutFromAllUsersStartupFolder() {Di2015NewLine        bool retVal = false;Di2015NewLine        string path = Path.Combine(getAllUsersStartupFolder(), Application.ProductName) + ".lnk";Di2015NewLine        if( File.Exists(path) ) {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                File.Delete(path);Di2015NewLine                retVal = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show(string.Format("Unable to remove this application from the Startup list.  Administrative privledges are required to perform this operation.\\n\\nDetails: SecurityException: {0}", ex.Message), "Update Startup Mode", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Error);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return retVal;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // TODO: Test this in vista to see if it prompts for credentials.Di2015NewLine    public static bool copyFile(FileInfo pSource, FileInfo pDestination)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool retVal = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            File.Copy(pSource.FullName, pDestination.FullName);Di2015NewLine            //MessageBox.Show("File has successfully been added.", "Copy File", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Information);Di2015NewLine            retVal = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (System.Security.SecurityException secEx)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(string.Format("SecurityException: {0}", secEx.Message), "Copy File", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Error);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (UnauthorizedAccessException authEx)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(string.Format("UnauthorizedAccessException: {0}", authEx.Message), "Copy File", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Error);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(ex.Message, "Copy File", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Error);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return retVal;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Special Folder constantsDi2015NewLine    const int CSIDL_DESKTOP = 0x0000;        // <desktop>Di2015NewLine    const int CSIDL_INTERNET = 0x0001;        // Internet Explorer (icon on desktop)Di2015NewLine    const int CSIDL_PROGRAMS = 0x0002;        // Start Menu\\ProgramsDi2015NewLine    const int CSIDL_CONTROLS = 0x0003; 1064231Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string FindConstantName<T>(Type containingType, T value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    EqualityComparer<T> comparer = EqualityComparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (FieldInfo field in containingType.GetFieldsDi2015NewLine             (BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (field.FieldType == typeof(T) &&Di2015NewLine            comparer.Equals(value, (T) field.GetValue(null)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return field.Name; // There could be others, of course...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null; // Or throw an exceptionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1064429Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///  Read in wav file and put into Left and right arrayDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="fileName"></param>Di2015NewLine    private void ReadWavfiles(string fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] fa = File.ReadAllBytes(fileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int startByte = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // look for data headerDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var x = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (x < fa.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (fa[x]     == 'd' && fa[x + 1] == 'a' && Di2015NewLine                    fa[x + 2] == 't' && fa[x + 3] == 'a')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    startByte = x + 8;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                x++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Split out channels from sampleDi2015NewLine        var sLeft = new short[fa.Length / 4];Di2015NewLine        var sRight = new short[fa.Length / 4];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var x = 0;Di2015NewLine            var length = fa.Length;Di2015NewLine            for (int s = startByte; s < length; s = s + 4)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sLeft[x] = (short)(fa[s + 1] * 0x100 + fa[s]);Di2015NewLine                sRight[x] = (short)(fa[s + 3] * 0x100 + fa[s + 2]);Di2015NewLine                x++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // do somthing with the wav data in sLeft and sRightDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1070498Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<Int32> numbering = new List<Int32>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineInt32 lastNestingLevel = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (String line in lines)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String[] parts = line.Split(new Char[] { ' ' }, 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Int32 currentNestingLevel = parts[0].Count(c => c == '.');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (currentNestingLevel > lastNestingLevel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Start a new nesting level with number one.Di2015NewLine        numbering.Add(1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (currentNestingLevel == lastNestingLevel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         // Increment the number of the current nesting level.Di2015NewLine        numbering[currentNestingLevel] += 1;        }Di2015NewLine    else if (currentNestingLevel < lastNestingLevel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         // Remove the deepest nesting level...Di2015NewLine        numbering.RemoveAt(numbering.Count - 1);Di2015NewLine         // ...and increment the numbering of the current nesting level.Di2015NewLine        numbering[currentNestingLevel] += 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    lastNestingLevel = currentNestingLevel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String newNumbering = String.Join(".", numberingDi2015NewLine        .Select(n => n.ToString())Di2015NewLine        .ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(newNumbering + " " + parts[1]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1072205Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<int> GeneratePrimesNaive(int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> primes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    primes.Add(2);Di2015NewLine    int nextPrime = 3;Di2015NewLine    while (primes.Count < n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int sqrt = (int)Math.Sqrt(nextPrime);Di2015NewLine        bool isPrime = true;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; (int)primes[i] <= sqrt; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (nextPrime % primes[i] == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                isPrime = false;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (isPrime)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            primes.Add(nextPrime);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        nextPrime += 2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return primes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1072205Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int ApproximateNthPrime(int nn)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double n = (double)nn;Di2015NewLine    double p;Di2015NewLine    if (nn >= 7022)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        p = n * Math.Log(n) + n * (Math.Log(Math.Log(n)) - 0.9385);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (nn >= 6)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        p = n * Math.Log(n) + n * Math.Log(Math.Log(n));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (nn > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        p = new int[] { 2, 3, 5, 7, 11 }[nn - 1];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        p = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (int)p;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Find all primes up to and including the limitDi2015NewLinepublic static BitArray SieveOfEratosthenes(int limit)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BitArray bits = new BitArray(limit + 1, true);Di2015NewLine    bits[0] = false;Di2015NewLine    bits[1] = false;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i * i <= limit; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bits[i])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = i * i; j <= limit; j += i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bits[j] = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bits;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static List<int> GeneratePrimesSieveOfEratosthenes(int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int limit = ApproximateNthPrime(n);Di2015NewLine    BitArray bits = SieveOfEratosthenes(limit);Di2015NewLine    List<int> primes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0, found = 0; i < limit && found < n; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bits[i])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            primes.Add(i);Di2015NewLine            found++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return primes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1072205Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static BitArray SieveOfSundaram(int limit)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    limit /= 2;Di2015NewLine    BitArray bits = new BitArray(limit + 1, true);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; 3 * i + 1 < limit; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 1; i + j + 2 * i * j <= limit; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bits[i + j + 2 * i * j] = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bits;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static List<int> GeneratePrimesSieveOfSundaram(int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int limit = ApproximateNthPrime(n);Di2015NewLine    BitArray bits = SieveOfSundaram(limit);Di2015NewLine    List<int> primes = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    primes.Add(2);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1, found = 1; 2 * i + 1 <= limit && found < n; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bits[i])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            primes.Add(2 * i + 1);Di2015NewLine            found++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return primes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1075523Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class LockCollection<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly HashSet<T> items = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly object padlock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Contains(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (padlock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return items.Contains(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Add(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (padlock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // HashSet<T>.Add does what you want already :)Di2015NewLine            // Note that it will return true if the itemDi2015NewLine            // *was* added (i.e. !Contains(item))Di2015NewLine            return items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WaitForNonExistence(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (padlock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (items.Contains(item))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Wait(padlock);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void WaitForAndAdd(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (padlock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WaitForNonExistence(item);Di2015NewLine            items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Remove(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (padlock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (items.Remove(item))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.PulseAll(padlock);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1075572Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string HtmlReformat(string html)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sw = new StringWriter();Di2015NewLine        HtmlTextWriter htmlWriter = new HtmlTextWriter(sw);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XmlReader rdr = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(html));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (rdr.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (rdr.NodeType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case XmlNodeType.EndElement:Di2015NewLine                    htmlWriter.WriteEndTag(rdr.Name);Di2015NewLine                    htmlWriter.Write(System.Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case XmlNodeType.Element:Di2015NewLine                        htmlWriter.WriteBeginTag(rdr.Name);Di2015NewLine                        for (int attributeIdx = 0; attributeIdx < rdr.AttributeCount; attributeIdx++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                                string attribName = rdr.GetAttribute(attributeIdx);Di2015NewLine                                htmlWriter.WriteAttribute(rdr.Name, attribName);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        htmlWriter.Write(">");Di2015NewLine                        htmlWriter.Write(System.Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                case XmlNodeType.Text:Di2015NewLine                    htmlWriter.Write(rdr.Value);Di2015NewLine                    break; Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    throw new NotImplementedException("Handle " + rdr.NodeType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sw.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1078898Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string numberPattern = " ({0})";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string NextAvailableFilename(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Short-cut if already availableDi2015NewLine    if (!File.Exists(path))Di2015NewLine        return path;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If path has extension then insert the number pattern just before the extension and return next filenameDi2015NewLine    if (Path.HasExtension(path))Di2015NewLine        return GetNextFilename(path.Insert(path.LastIndexOf(Path.GetExtension(path)), numberPattern));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Otherwise just append the pattern to the path and return next filenameDi2015NewLine    return GetNextFilename(path + numberPattern);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string GetNextFilename(string pattern)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string tmp = string.Format(pattern, 1);Di2015NewLine    if (tmp == pattern)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("The pattern must include an index place-holder", "pattern");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!File.Exists(tmp))Di2015NewLine        return tmp; // short-circuit if no matchesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int min = 1, max = 2; // min is inclusive, max is exclusive/untestedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (File.Exists(string.Format(pattern, max)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        min = max;Di2015NewLine        max *= 2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (max != min + 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pivot = (max + min) / 2;Di2015NewLine        if (File.Exists(string.Format(pattern, pivot)))Di2015NewLine            min = pivot;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            max = pivot;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return string.Format(pattern, max);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1078913Di2015UniqueSeparatorParent -(children)-> ChildDi2015NewLine       <--(parent)--Di2015NewLine
1078913Di2015UniqueSeparatorParent {Key="abc"} -(child keys)-> {string}Di2015NewLineChild {Key="def"} -(parent key)-> {string}Di2015NewLine

1080445Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] ReadToEnd(System.IO.Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long originalPosition = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(stream.CanSeek)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             originalPosition = stream.Position;Di2015NewLine             stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] readBuffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int totalBytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine            int bytesRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while ((bytesRead = stream.Read(readBuffer, totalBytesRead, readBuffer.Length - totalBytesRead)) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                totalBytesRead += bytesRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (totalBytesRead == readBuffer.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int nextByte = stream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine                    if (nextByte != -1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        byte[] temp = new byte[readBuffer.Length * 2];Di2015NewLine                        Buffer.BlockCopy(readBuffer, 0, temp, 0, readBuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                        Buffer.SetByte(temp, totalBytesRead, (byte)nextByte);Di2015NewLine                        readBuffer = temp;Di2015NewLine                        totalBytesRead++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = readBuffer;Di2015NewLine            if (readBuffer.Length != totalBytesRead)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                buffer = new byte[totalBytesRead];Di2015NewLine                Buffer.BlockCopy(readBuffer, 0, buffer, 0, totalBytesRead);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return buffer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(stream.CanSeek)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 stream.Position = originalPosition; Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1082691Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsOrderedBy<TSource, TKey>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool isFirstPass = true;Di2015NewLine    TSource previous = default(TSource);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (TSource item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!isFirstPass)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TKey key = keySelector(item);Di2015NewLine            TKey previousKey = keySelector(previous);Di2015NewLine            if (Comparer<TKey>.Default.Compare(previousKey, key) > 0)Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        isFirstPass = false;Di2015NewLine        previous = item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1085642Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic T Max<T>(IEnumerable<T> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Comparer<T> comparer = Comparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<T> iterator = items.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("No elements");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        T currentMax = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now we've got an initial value, loop over the restDi2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T candidate = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine            if (comparer.Compare(candidate, currentMax) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                currentMax = candidate;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return currentMax;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1086541Di2015UniqueSeparator#include <algorithm>Di2015NewLine#include <list>Di2015NewLine#include <string>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace LinqTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // C++ does not specificy a standard GUI library.Di2015NewLine    // This is a small hack to make the code work below.Di2015NewLine    // In a real solution, one would probably have a realDi2015NewLine    // Color class that stores the red, green, and blueDi2015NewLine    // components of the colors and provides operationsDi2015NewLine    // to act upon colors.Di2015NewLine    struct ColorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \static const int Red = 0;Di2015NewLine    \static const int Green = 1;Di2015NewLine    \static const int Blue = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \Color(void) :Di2015NewLine    \value(0)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \Color(int color) :Di2015NewLine    \value(color)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \bool operator==(const Color& rhs) constDi2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\return value == rhs.value;Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \int value;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    struct VehicleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \Vehicle(void) :Di2015NewLine    \Id(0)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \Vehicle(int id, Color colour) :Di2015NewLine    \Id(id),Di2015NewLine    \Colour(colour)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \bool operator==(const Vehicle& rhs) constDi2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\return Id == rhs.Id;Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \int Id;Di2015NewLine    \Color Colour;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    struct TyreDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \Tyre(void) :Di2015NewLine    \Id(0),Di2015NewLine    \BikeId(0),Di2015NewLine    \Size(0)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \Tyre(int id, int bikeId, int size, std::string brand) :Di2015NewLine    \Id(id),Di2015NewLine    \BikeId(bikeId),Di2015NewLine    \Size(size),Di2015NewLine    \Brand(brand)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \int Id;Di2015NewLine    \int BikeId;Di2015NewLine    \int Size;Di2015NewLine    \std::string Brand;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    struct Car :Di2015NewLine    \public VehicleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \Car(void)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \Car(int id, Color colour) :Di2015NewLine    \Vehicle(id, colour)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    struct Bike :Di2015NewLine    \public VehicleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \Bike(int id, Color colour) :Di2015NewLine    \Vehicle(id, colour)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ExampleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    // I put private up top to match yours, but most C++Di2015NewLine    // programmers would prefer it on the bottom, justifiedDi2015NewLine    // by the fact users of the class don't care or wantDi2015NewLine    // to see how the class works, they want to see how toDi2015NewLine    // use it.Di2015NewLine    private:Di2015NewLine    \std::list<Car> cars;Di2015NewLine    \std::list<Tyre> bikeTyres;Di2015NewLine    \std::list<Bike> bikes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public:Di2015NewLine    \Example(void)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\cars.push_back(Car(0, Color::Red));Di2015NewLine    \\cars.push_back(Car(1, Color::Blue));Di2015NewLine    \\cars.push_back(Car(2, Color::Green));Di2015NewLine    \\cars.push_back(Car(3, Color::Green));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \\bikeTyres.push_back(Tyre(0, 0, 23, "TyreCo1"));Di2015NewLine    \\bikeTyres.push_back(Tyre(1, 0, 23, "TyreCo1"));Di2015NewLine    \\bikeTyres.push_back(Tyre(2, 1, 30, "TyreCo2"));Di2015NewLine    \\bikeTyres.push_back(Tyre(3, 1, 30, "TyreCo2"));Di2015NewLine    \\bikeTyres.push_back(Tyre(4, 2, 23, "TyreCo3"));Di2015NewLine    \\bikeTyres.push_back(Tyre(5, 2, 23, "TyreCo3"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \\bikes.push_back(Bike(0, Color::Red));Di2015NewLine    \\bikes.push_back(Bike(1, Color::Blue));Di2015NewLine    \\bikes.push_back(Bike(2, Color::Green));Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// I chose to return pointers to Vehicles to maintain anyDi2015NewLine    \// polymorphic behavior, since from what I understand C#Di2015NewLine    \// would be returning references here.Di2015NewLine    \std::list<Vehicle*> FindVehiclesByColour(Color colour)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\typedef std::list<Car>::iterator car_iterator;Di2015NewLine    \\typedef std::list<Bike>::iterator bike_iterator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \\std::list<Vehicle*> result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \\for Di2015NewLine           bw.ReportProgress(chunkNum++);Di2015NewLine           if (done) then break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1094148Di2015UniqueSeparator  private void drawAndShadeTheImage(Graphics g)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     //if the image is null then there is nothing to do.Di2015NewLine     if (Image != null)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        Bitmap bitMap = new Bitmap(Image);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //if this control is selected, shade the image to allow the user toDi2015NewLine        //visual identify what is selected.Di2015NewLine        if (ContainsFocus)Di2015NewLine        {               Di2015NewLine           //The delta is the percentage of change in color shading of Di2015NewLine           //the image.Di2015NewLine           int delta = 70;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           //zero is the lowest value (0 - 255) that can be represented byDi2015NewLine           //a color component.Di2015NewLine           int zero = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           //Get each pixel in the image and shade it.Di2015NewLine           for (int y = 0; y < bitMap.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              for (int x = 0; x < bitMap.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 Color oColor = bitMap.GetPixel(x, y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 //Lime is the background color on the image and shouldDi2015NewLine                 //always be transparent, if this check is removed theDi2015NewLine                 //background will be displayed.Di2015NewLine                 if (oColor.ToArgb() != Color.Lime.ToArgb())Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                    int oR = oColor.R - delta < zero ? zero : Di2015NewLine                       oColor.R - delta;Di2015NewLine                    int oG = oColor.G - delta < zero ? zero : Di2015NewLine                       oColor.G - delta;Di2015NewLine                    int oB = oColor.B - delta < zero ? zero : Di2015NewLine                       oColor.B - delta;Di2015NewLine                    int oA = oColor.A - delta < zero ? zero : Di2015NewLine                       oColor.A - delta;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Color nColor = Color.FromArgb(oA, oR, oG, oB);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    bitMap.SetPixel(x, y, nColor);Di2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Make the background of the image transparent.Di2015NewLine        bitMap.MakeTransparent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        g.DrawImage(bitMap, this.ClientRectangle);            Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

1097516Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void TestCustomException<T>() where T : ExceptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Custom exceptions should have the following 3 constructorsDi2015NewLine    var e1 = (T)Activator.CreateInstance(t, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const string message = "message";Di2015NewLine    var e2 = (T)Activator.CreateInstance(t, message);Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual(message, e2.Message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var innerEx = new Exception("inner Exception");Di2015NewLine    var e3 = (T)Activator.CreateInstance(t, message, innerEx);Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual(message, e3.Message);Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual(innerEx, e3.InnerException);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //They should also be serializableDi2015NewLine    var stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    var formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine    formatter.Serialize(stream, e3);Di2015NewLine    stream.Flush();Di2015NewLine    stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    var e4 = (T)formatter.Deserialize(stream);Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual(message, e4.Message);Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual(innerEx.ToString(), e4.InnerException.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1098485Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void DropSubscription()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RaiseSyncManagerStatus(string.Format("Dropping subscription '{0}'.", _publicationName));Di2015NewLine            Server srv = new Server(_subscriberName);Di2015NewLine            MergePullSubscription sub = GetSubscription(srv.ConnectionContext);Di2015NewLine            // Remove if it existsDi2015NewLine            // Cannot remove from publisher because sysadmin or dbo roles are requiredDi2015NewLine            if (sub.LoadProperties() == true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sub.Remove();Di2015NewLine                RaiseSyncManagerStatus("Subscription dropped.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                RaiseSyncManagerStatus("Removing subscription registration from the publisher.");Di2015NewLine                Server srvPub = new Server(_publisherName);Di2015NewLine                MergePublication pub = GetPublication(srvPub.ConnectionContext);Di2015NewLine                // Remove the subscription registrationDi2015NewLine                pub.RemovePullSubscription(srv.Name, _subscriberDbName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RaiseSyncManagerStatus("Failed to drop subscription; 1099667Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct Color32Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const uint BlueMask  = 0xFF000000;       Di2015NewLine    const uint GreenMask = 0x00FF0000;Di2015NewLine    const uint RedMask   = 0x0000FF00;Di2015NewLine    const uint AlphaMask = 0x000000FF;Di2015NewLine    const int BlueShift  = 24;       Di2015NewLine    const int GreenShift = 16;Di2015NewLine    const int RedShift   = 8;Di2015NewLine    const int AlphaShift = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private byte GetComponent(uint mask, int shift)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var b = (this.ARGB & mask);Di2015NewLine        return (byte) (b >> shift);            Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetComponent(int shift, byte value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var b = ((uint)value) << shiftDi2015NewLine        this.ARGB |= b;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public byte Blue Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return GetComponent(BlueMask, BlueShift); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetComponent(BlueShift, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public byte GreenDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return GetComponent(GreenMask, GreenShift); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetComponent(GreenShift, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public byte RedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return GetComponent(RedMask, RedShift); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetComponent(RedShift, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public byte AlphaDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return GetComponent(AlphaMask, AlphaShift); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetComponent(AlphaShift, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Permits the color32 to be treated as an UInt32Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public uint ARGB;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Return the color for this Color32 objectDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public Color ColorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return Color.FromArgb(Alpha, Red, Green, Blue); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1099715Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Bitmap Quantize(Image source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get the size of the source imageDi2015NewLine    int height = source.Height;Di2015NewLine    int width = source.Width;Di2015NewLine    // And construct a rectangle from these dimensionsDi2015NewLine    Rectangle bounds = new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height);Di2015NewLine    // First off take a 32bpp copy of the imageDi2015NewLine    Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine    // And construct an 8bpp versionDi2015NewLine    Bitmap output = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed);Di2015NewLine    // Now lock the bitmap into memoryDi2015NewLine    using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(copy))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        g.PageUnit = GraphicsUnit.Pixel;Di2015NewLine        // Draw the source image onto the copy bitmap,Di2015NewLine        // which will effect a widening as appropriate.Di2015NewLine            g.DrawImage(source, bounds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //!! BEGIN CHANGES - no locking hereDi2015NewLine    //!! simply use copy not a pointer to itDi2015NewLine    //!! you could also simply write directly to a buffer then make the final immage in one go but I don't bother hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Call the FirstPass function if not a single pass algorithm.Di2015NewLine    // For something like an octree quantizer, this will run throughDi2015NewLine    // all image pixels, build a data structure, and create a palette.Di2015NewLine    if (!_singlePass)Di2015NewLine        FirstPass(copy, width, height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Then set the color palette on the output bitmap. I'm passing in the current palette Di2015NewLine    // as there's no way to construct a new, empty palette.Di2015NewLine    output.Palette = GetPalette(output.Palette);Di2015NewLine    // Then call the second pass which actually does the conversionDi2015NewLine    SecondPass(copy, output, width, height, bounds);Di2015NewLine    //!! END CHANGESDi2015NewLine    // Last but not least, return the output bitmapDi2015NewLine    return output;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//!! Completely changed, note that I assume all the code is changed to just use Color rather than Color32Di2015NewLineprotected  virtual void FirstPass(Bitmap source, int width, int height)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Loop through each rowDi2015NewLine    for (int row = 0; row < height; row++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // And loop through each columnDi2015NewLine        for (int col = 0; col < width; col++)Di2015NewLine        {            Di2015NewLine            InitialQuantizePixel(source.GetPixel(col, row)); Di2015NewLine        }   // Now I have the pixel, call the FirstPassQuantize function...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1099715Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap.SetPixel()

1101610Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static D GetMethodAccessor<D>(MethodInfo mi) where D : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type[] args = typeof(D).GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLine    if (args.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Type argument D must be generic.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type instanceType = args[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If return type is not null, use one less argDi2015NewLine    bool isAction = mi.ReturnType == typeof(void);Di2015NewLine    int callArgCount = args.Length - (isAction ? 1 : 2);Di2015NewLine    Type[] argTypes = args.Skip(1).Take(callArgCount).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(instanceType, "obj");Di2015NewLine    var arguments = argTypes.Select((t, i) => Expression.Parameter(t, "p" + i))Di2015NewLine                            .ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var invoke = Expression.Call(param, mi, arguments);Di2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<D>(invoke,Di2015NewLine                     Enumerable.Repeat(param, 1).Concat(arguments));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Debug.WriteLine(lambda.Body);Di2015NewLine    return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1108637Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] ReadFully(Stream input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[16*1024];Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int read;Di2015NewLine        while ((read = input.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ms.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1115600Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring text = @"The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.";Di2015NewLinestring[] searchKeywords = { "quick", "fox", "lazy" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// build pattern based on keywords - you probably had a routine in place for thisDi2015NewLinevar patternQuery = searchKeywordsDi2015NewLine                        .Select((s, i) => Di2015NewLine                            String.Format("(?<c{0}>{1})", i, s) +Di2015NewLine                            (i < searchKeywords.Length - 1 ? "|" : ""))Di2015NewLine                        .Distinct();Di2015NewLinestring pattern = String.Join("", patternQuery.ToArray());Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Dynamic pattern: {0}\\n", pattern);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// use RegexOptions.IgnoreCase for case-insensitve searchDi2015NewLineRegex rx = new Regex(pattern);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Notes:Di2015NewLine// - Skip(1): used to ignore first groupname of 0 (entire match)Di2015NewLine// - The idea is to use the groupname and its corresponding match. The WhereDi2015NewLine//   clause matches the pair up correctly based on the current match valueDi2015NewLine//   and returns the appropriate groupnameDi2015NewLinestring result = rx.Replace(text, m => String.Format(@"<span class=""{0}"">{1}</span>", Di2015NewLine                    rx.GetGroupNames()Di2015NewLine                    .Skip(1)Di2015NewLine                    .Where(g => m.Value == m.Groups[rx.GroupNumberFromName(g)].Value)Di2015NewLine                    .Single(),Di2015NewLine                    m.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Original Text: {0}\\n", text);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Result: {0}", result);Di2015NewLine
1115600Di2015UniqueSeparatorDynamic pattern: (?<c0>quick)|(?<c1>fox)|(?<c2>lazy)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineOriginal Text: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineResult: The <span class="c0">quick</span> brown <span class="c1">fox</span> jumps over the <span class="c2">lazy</span> dog. The <span class="c0">quick</span> brown <span class="c1">fox</span> jumps over the <span class="c2">lazy</span> dog.Di2015NewLine

1119348Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Gets the correct SqlDBType for a given .NET type. Useful for working with SQL CE.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="type">The .Net Type used to find the SqlDBType.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>The correct SqlDbType for the .Net type passed in.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static SqlDbType GetSqlDBTypeFromType(Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TypeConverter tc = TypeDescriptor.GetConverter(typeof(DbType));Di2015NewLine    if (/*tc.CanConvertFrom(type)*/ true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \DbType dbType = (DbType)tc.ConvertFrom(type.Name);Di2015NewLine    \// A cheat, but the parameter class knows how to map between DbType and SqlDBType.Di2015NewLine    \SqlParameter param = new SqlParameter();Di2015NewLine    \param.DbType = dbType;Di2015NewLine    \return param.SqlDbType; // The parameter class did the conversion for us!!Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \throw new Exception("Cannot get SqlDbType from: " + type.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1119348Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// The method gets the SQL CE type name for use in SQL Statements such as CREATE TABLEDi2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="dbType">The SqlDbType to get the type name for</param>Di2015NewLine            /// <param name="size">The size where applicable e.g. to create a nchar(n) type where n is the size passed in.</param>Di2015NewLine            /// <returns>The SQL CE compatible type for use in SQL Statements</returns>Di2015NewLine            public static string GetSqlServerCETypeName(SqlDbType dbType, int size)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Conversions according to: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms173018.aspxDi2015NewLine                bool max = (size == int.MaxValue) ? true : false;Di2015NewLine                bool over4k = (size > 4000) ? true : false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                switch (dbType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case SqlDbType.BigInt:Di2015NewLine                        return "bigint";Di2015NewLine                    case SqlDbType.Binary:Di2015NewLine                        return string.Format("binary ({0})", size);Di2015NewLine                    case SqlDbType.Bit:Di2015NewLine                        return "bit";Di2015NewLine                    case SqlDbType.Char:Di2015NewLine                        if (over4k) return "ntext";Di2015NewLine                        else return string.Format("nchar({0})", size);Di2015NewLineETC...Di2015NewLine
1119348Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Genenerates a SQL CE compatible CREATE TABLE statement based on a schema obtained fromDi2015NewLine    /// a SqlDataReader or a SqlCeDataReader.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="tableName">The name of the table to be created.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="schema">The schema returned from reader.GetSchemaTable().</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The CREATE TABLE... Statement for the given schema.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GetCreateTableStatement(string tableName, DataTable schema)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        builder.Append(string.Format("CREATE TABLE [{0}] (\\n", tableName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow row in schema.Rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string typeName = row["DataType"].ToString();Di2015NewLine            Type type = Type.GetType(typeName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string name = (string)row["ColumnName"];Di2015NewLine            int size = (int)row["ColumnSize"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SqlDbType dbType = GetSqlDBTypeFromType(type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            builder.Append(name);Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(" ");Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(GetSqlServerCETypeName(dbType, size));Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(", ");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (schema.Rows.Count > 0) builder.Length = builder.Length - 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        builder.Append("\\n)");Di2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1120126Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static PointF FindLineIntersection(PointF start1, PointF end1, PointF start2, PointF end2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine\float denom = ((end1.X - start1.X) * (end2.Y - start2.Y)) - ((end1.Y - start1.Y) * (end2.X - start2.X));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\//  AB & CD are parallel Di2015NewLine\if (denom == 0)Di2015NewLine\\return PointF.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\float numer = ((start1.Y - start2.Y) * (end2.X - start2.X)) - ((start1.X - start2.X) * (end2.Y - start2.Y));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\float r = numer / denom;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\float numer2 = ((start1.Y - start2.Y) * (end1.X - start1.X)) - ((start1.X - start2.X) * (end1.Y - start1.Y));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\float s = numer2 / denom;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((r < 0 || r > 1) || (s < 0 || s > 1))Di2015NewLine\\return PointF.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// Find intersection pointDi2015NewLine\PointF result = new PointF();Di2015NewLine\result.X = start1.X + (r * (end1.X - start1.X));Di2015NewLine\result.Y = start1.Y + (r * (end1.Y - start1.Y));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\return result;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
1120238Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \caller("Foo", "Bar");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void caller(String myclass, String mymethod)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \// Get a type from the string Di2015NewLine    \Type type = Type.GetType(myclass);Di2015NewLine    \// Create an instance of that typeDi2015NewLine    \Object obj = Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine    \// Retrieve the method you are looking forDi2015NewLine    \MethodInfo methodInfo = type.GetMethod(mymethod);Di2015NewLine    \// Invoke the method on the instance we created aboveDi2015NewLine    \methodInfo.Invoke(obj, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Bar()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \Console.WriteLine("Bar");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

BindingList<Person>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The list of people.Di2015NewLine    BindingList<Person> people = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BindingList<Person>        // If there is a list, then remove the delegate.Di2015NewLine            if (people != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Remove the delegate.Di2015NewLine                people.ListChanged -= OnListChanged;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* Perform error check here */ Di2015NewLine            people = value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Bind to the ListChangedEvent.Di2015NewLine            // Use lambda syntax if LINQ is available.Di2015NewLine            people.ListChanged += OnListChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Technically, the People property changed, so thatDi2015NewLine            // property changed event should be fired.Di2015NewLine            NotifyPropertyChanged("People");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Calculate the total age now, since the Di2015NewLine            // whole list was reassigned.Di2015NewLine            CalculateTotalAge();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void OnListChanged(object sender, ListChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Just calculate the total age.Di2015NewLine        CalculateTotalAge();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CalculateTotalAge()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Store the old total age.Di2015NewLine        int oldTotalAge = totalage;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If you can use LINQ, change this to:Di2015NewLine        // totalage = people.Sum(p => p.Age);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the total age to 0.Di2015NewLine        totalage = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Sum.Di2015NewLine        foreach (Person p in People) {Di2015NewLine            totalage += p.Age;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the total age has changed, then fire the event.Di2015NewLine        if (totalage != oldTotalAge)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Fire the property notify changed event.Di2015NewLine            NotifyPropertyChanged("TotalAge");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int totalage = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int TotalAge Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1120277Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string RemoveSpecialCharacters(string str) {Di2015NewLine   StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine   foreach (char c in str) {Di2015NewLine      if ((c >= '0' && c <= '9') || (c >= 'A' && c <= 'Z') || (c >= 'a' && c <= 'z') || c == '.' || c == '_') {Di2015NewLine         sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1120277Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool[] _lookup;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic Program() {Di2015NewLine   _lookup = new bool[65535];Di2015NewLine   for (char c = '0'; c <= '9'; c++) _lookup[c] = true;Di2015NewLine   for (char c = 'A'; c <= 'Z'; c++) _lookup[c] = true;Di2015NewLine   for (char c = 'a'; c <= 'z'; c++) _lookup[c] = true;Di2015NewLine   _lookup['.'] = true;Di2015NewLine   _lookup['_'] = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string RemoveSpecialCharacters(string str) {Di2015NewLine   char[] buffer = new char[str.Length];Di2015NewLine   int index = 0;Di2015NewLine   foreach (char c in str) {Di2015NewLine      if (_lookup[c]) {Di2015NewLine         buffer[index] = c;Di2015NewLine         index++;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return new string(buffer, 0, index);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1120294Di2015UniqueSeparatorHttpModule
1120294Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Used to correct non-secure requests to secure ones.Di2015NewLine/// If the website backend requires of SSL use, the whole requests Di2015NewLine/// should be secure.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class SecurityModule : IHttpModuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose() { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Init(HttpApplication application)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        application.BeginRequest += new EventHandler(application_BeginRequest);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void application_BeginRequest(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpApplication application = ((HttpApplication)(sender));Di2015NewLine        HttpRequest request = application.Request;Di2015NewLine        HttpResponse response = application.Response;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if the secure connection is required for backend and the current Di2015NewLine        // request doesn't use SSL, redirecting the request to be secureDi2015NewLine        if ({use SSL} && !request.IsSecureConnection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string absoluteUri = request.Url.AbsoluteUri;Di2015NewLine            response.Redirect(absoluteUri.Replace("http://", "https://"), true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1121864Di2015UniqueSeparator// this conditional is necessary if myType can be an interface,Di2015NewLine// because an interface doesn't implement itself: for example,Di2015NewLine// typeof (IList<int>).GetInterfaces () does not contain IList<int>!Di2015NewLineif (myType.IsInterface && myType.IsGenericType && Di2015NewLine    myType.GetGenericTypeDefinition () == typeof (IList<>))Di2015NewLine    return myType.GetGenericArguments ()[0] ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var i in myType.GetInterfaces ())Di2015NewLine    if (i.IsGenericType && i.GetGenericTypeDefinition () == typeof (IList<>))Di2015NewLine        return i.GetGenericArguments ()[0] ;Di2015NewLine

1122002Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void ConnectListAndSaveSQLCompactExample()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create a connection to the file datafile.sdf in the program folderDi2015NewLine        string dbfile = new System.IO.FileInfo(System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().Location).DirectoryName + "\\\\datafile.sdf";Di2015NewLine        SqlCeConnection connection = new SqlCeConnection("datasource=" + dbfile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Read all rows from the table test_table into a dataset (note, the adapter automatically opens the connection)Di2015NewLine        SqlCeDataAdapter adapter = new SqlCeDataAdapter("select * from test_table", connection);Di2015NewLine        DataSet data = new DataSet();Di2015NewLine        adapter.Fill(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add a row to the test_table (assume that table consists of a text column)Di2015NewLine        data.Tables[0].Rows.Add(new object[] { "New row added by code" });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Save data back to the databasefileDi2015NewLine        adapter.Update(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Close Di2015NewLine        connection.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1123385Di2015UniqueSeparators.ToLower().StartsWith("<div>")
1123385Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static string FixHtml(string s)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        if (s.ToLower().StartsWith("<div>"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return FixHtml(s.Substring(5, s.Length - 5));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (s.ToLower().StartsWith("<p>"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return FixHtml(s.Substring(3, s.Length - 3));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (s.ToLower().EndsWith("</div>"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return FixHtml(s.Substring(0, s.Length - 6));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (s.ToLower().EndsWith("</p>"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return FixHtml(s.Substring(0, s.Length - 4));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1123731Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static String PrintXML(String XML)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineString Result = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineMemoryStream mStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineXmlTextWriter writer = new XmlTextWriter(mStream, Encoding.Unicode);Di2015NewLineXmlDocument document   = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine\// Load the XmlDocument with the XML.Di2015NewLine\document.LoadXml(XML);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\writer.Formatting = Formatting.Indented;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// Write the XML into a formatting XmlTextWriterDi2015NewLine\document.WriteContentTo(writer);Di2015NewLine\writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine\mStream.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// Have to rewind the MemoryStream in order to readDi2015NewLine\// its contents.Di2015NewLine\mStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// Read MemoryStream contents into a StreamReader.Di2015NewLine\StreamReader sReader = new StreamReader(mStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\// Extract the text from the StreamReader.Di2015NewLine\String FormattedXML = sReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine\Result = FormattedXML;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinecatch (XmlException)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemStream.Close();Di2015NewLinewriter.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn Result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
