1132073Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ParameterToMemberExpressionRebinder : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression _paramExpr;Di2015NewLine    MemberExpression _memberExpr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ParameterToMemberExpressionRebinder(ParameterExpression paramExpr, MemberExpression memberExpr) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _paramExpr = paramExpr;Di2015NewLine        _memberExpr = memberExpr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression Visit(Expression p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return base.Visit(p == _paramExpr ? _memberExpr : p);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> CombinePropertySelectorWithPredicate<T, T2>(Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<T, T2>> propertySelector,Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<T2, bool>> propertyPredicate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var memberExpression = propertySelector.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (memberExpression == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("propertySelector");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var expr = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(propertyPredicate.Body, propertySelector.Parameters);Di2015NewLine        var rebinder = new ParameterToMemberExpressionRebinder(propertyPredicate.Parameters[0], memberExpression);Di2015NewLine        expr = (Expression<Func<T, bool>>)rebinder.Visit(expr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return expr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class OrderLineDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class OrderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public List<OrderLine> Lines;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<Order, List<OrderLine>>> selectOrderLines = o => o.Lines;Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<List<OrderLine>, Boolean>> validateOrderLines = lines => lines.Count > 0;Di2015NewLine        var validateOrder = ParameterToMemberExpressionRebinder.CombinePropertySelectorWithPredicate(selectOrderLines, validateOrderLines);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // validateOrder: {o => (o.Lines.Count > 0)}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1132466Di2015UniqueSeparatorOrderedIntersect()
1132466Di2015UniqueSeparatorO(n)
1132466Di2015UniqueSeparator.Intersect()
1132466Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> OrderedIntersect<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, IEnumerable<T> other) where T : IComparableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var xe = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    using (var ye = other.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (xe.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           while (ye.MoveNext() && ye.Current.CompareTo(xe.Current) < 0 )Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              // do nothing - all we care here is that we advanced the y enumeratorDi2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           if (ye.Current.Equals(xe.Current))Di2015NewLine              yield return xe.Current;Di2015NewLine           elseDi2015NewLine           {  // y is now > x, so get x caught up againDi2015NewLine              while (xe.MoveNext() && xe.Current.CompareTo(ye.Current) < 0 )Di2015NewLine              { } // again: just advance, do do anythingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              if (xe.Current.Equals(ye.Current)) yield return xe.Current;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1135290Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace myRSSVideoReaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic static class FlvMetadataReaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static string onMetaData = "";Di2015NewLine    static string bytesToFile = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Reads the meta information (if present) in an FLVDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="uri">The uri to the FLV file</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static MediaMetadataInfo GetMetadataInfo(string uri)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //needed for the file name onlyDi2015NewLine        Uri newUri = new Uri(uri);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stream strm = null;Di2015NewLine        StreamReader MyReader = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool hasMetaData = false;Di2015NewLine        double duration = 0;Di2015NewLine        double width = 0;Di2015NewLine        double height = 0;Di2015NewLine        double videoDataRate = 0;Di2015NewLine        double audioDataRate = 0;Di2015NewLine        double frameRate = 0;Di2015NewLine        DateTime creationDate = DateTime.MinValue;Di2015NewLine        int range = 800;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //byte[] result;Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[range];Di2015NewLine            strm = GetURLStream(uri, range);Di2015NewLine            if (strm != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream fileStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine                    doDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        count = strm.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                        fileStream.Write(buffer, 0, count);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    while (count != 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // read where "onMetaData" in flash, this indicates we've got maetadataDi2015NewLine                    byte[] bytes = new byte[1000];Di2015NewLine                    fileStream.Seek(27, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                    int result = fileStream.Read(bytes, 0, 1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // if "onMetaData" exists then proceed to read the attributesDi2015NewLine                    bytesToFile = ByteArrayToString(bytes);Di2015NewLine                    onMetaData = bytesToFile.Substring(0, 10);Di2015NewLine                    if (onMetaData == "onMetaData")Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        hasMetaData = true;Di2015NewLine                        duration = GetNextDouble(bytes, bytesToFile.IndexOf("duration") + 9, 8);Di2015NewLine                        duration = Math.Round(duration);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        width = GetNextDouble(bytes, bytesToFile.IndexOf("width") + 6, 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        height = GetNextDouble(bytes, bytesToFile.IndexOf("height") + 7, 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        videoDataRate = GetNextDouble(bytes, bytesToFile.IndexOf("videodatarate") + 14, 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        audioDataRate = GetNextDouble(bytes, bytesToFile.IndexOf("audiodatarate") + 14, 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        frameRate = GetNextDouble(bytes, bytesToFile.IndexOf("framerate") + 10, 8);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    fileStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                    fileStream.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                }                    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch {}Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // do some cleanupDi2015NewLine            if (MyReader != null)                Di2015NewLine                MyReader.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (strm != null)                Di2015NewLine                strm.Close();                Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string filename = Path.GetFileName(newUri.AbsoluteUri);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new MediaMetadataInfo(hasMetaData, filename, duration, width, height, videoDataRate, audioDataRate, frameRate, creationDate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* ------------------------------------------------------------- */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Stream GetURLStream(string strURL, int range)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        WebRequest req;Di2015NewLine        WebResponse res = null;Di2015NewLine        Stream respStream;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            req = WebRequest.Create(strURL);Di2015NewLine            ((HttpWebRequest)req).UserAgent = "myRSSVideoReader/1.0.0.12 (compatible; http://www.myrssvideoreader.com; Your RSS feeds need duration value;)";Di2015NewLine            ((HttpWebRequest)req).AddRange(0, range * 2); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            res = req.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            respStream = res.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return respStream;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            res.Close();Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* ------------------------------------------------------------- */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Double GetNextDouble(Byte[] b, int offset, int length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(b);Di2015NewLine        // move the desired number of places in the arrayDi2015NewLine        ms.Seek(offset, SeekOrigin.Current);Di2015NewLine        // create byte arrayDi2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = new byte[length];Di2015NewLine        // read bytesDi2015NewLine        int result = ms.Read(bytes, 0, length);Di2015NewLine        // convert to double (all flass values are written in reverse order)Di2015NewLine        return ByteArrayToDouble(bytes, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* ------------------------------------------------------------- */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static String ByteArrayToString(byte[] bytes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string byteString = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        foreach (byte b in bytes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byteString += Convert.ToChar(b).ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return byteString;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* ------------------------------------------------------------- */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Double ByteArrayToDouble(byte[] bytes, bool readInReverse)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (bytes.Length != 8)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("bytes must be exactly 8 in Length");Di2015NewLine        if (readInReverse)Di2015NewLine            Array.Reverse(bytes);Di2015NewLine        return BitConverter.ToDouble(bytes, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1136591Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Method to populate a list with all the classDi2015NewLine/// in the namespace provided by the userDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="nameSpace">The namespace the user wants searched</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLinestatic List<string> GetAllClasses(string nameSpace)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //create an Assembly and use its GetExecutingAssembly MethodDi2015NewLine    //http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.reflection.assembly.getexecutingassembly.aspxDi2015NewLine    Assembly asm = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLine    //create a list for the namespacesDi2015NewLine    List<string> namespaceList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    //create a list that will hold all the classesDi2015NewLine    //the suplied namespace is executingDi2015NewLine    List<string> returnList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    //loop through all the "Types" in the Assembly usingDi2015NewLine    //the GetType method:Di2015NewLine    //http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.reflection.assembly.gettypes.aspxDi2015NewLine    foreach (Type type in asm.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (type.Namespace == nameSpace)Di2015NewLine            namespaceList.Add(type.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (String className in namespaceList)Di2015NewLine        returnList.Add(className);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return returnList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1142194Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing ProtoBuf;Di2015NewLine[ProtoContract]Di2015NewLineclass CacheItemDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(1)]Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(2)]Di2015NewLine    public int AnotherNumber { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<string, CacheItemValue> dataDi2015NewLine        = new Dictionary<string,CacheItemValue>();Di2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(3)]Di2015NewLine    public Dictionary<string, CacheItemValue> Data { get { return data; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //[ProtoMember(4)] // commented out while I investigate...Di2015NewLine    public ListNode Nodes { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine[ProtoContract]Di2015NewLineclass ListNode // I'd probably expose this as a simple list, thoughDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(1)]Di2015NewLine    public double Head { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(2)]Di2015NewLine    public ListNode Tail { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine[ProtoContract]Di2015NewLineclass CacheItemValueDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(1)]Di2015NewLine    public string Key { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    [ProtoMember(2)]Di2015NewLine    public float Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // invent 400k CacheItemValue recordsDi2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, CacheItem> htCacheItems = new Dictionary<string, CacheItem>();Di2015NewLine        Random rand = new Random(123456);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 400; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string key;Di2015NewLine            CacheItem ci = new CacheItem {Di2015NewLine                Id = rand.Next(10000),Di2015NewLine                AnotherNumber = rand.Next(10000)Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            while (htCacheItems.ContainsKey(key = rand.NextString())) {}Di2015NewLine            htCacheItems.Add(key, ci);Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < 1000; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (ci.Data.ContainsKey(key = rand.NextString())) { }Di2015NewLine                ci.Data.Add(key,Di2015NewLine                    new CacheItemValue {Di2015NewLine                        Key = key,Di2015NewLine                        Value = (float)rand.NextDouble()Di2015NewLine                    });Di2015NewLine                int tail = rand.Next(1, 50);Di2015NewLine                ListNode node = null;Di2015NewLine                while (tail-- > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    node = new ListNodeDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Tail = node,Di2015NewLine                        Head = rand.NextDouble()Di2015NewLine                    };Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ci.Nodes = node;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(GetChecksum(htCacheItems));Di2015NewLine        using (Stream outfile = File.Create("raw.bin"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Serializer.Serialize(outfile, htCacheItems);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        htCacheItems = null;Di2015NewLine        using (Stream inFile = File.OpenRead("raw.bin"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            htCacheItems = Serializer.Deserialize<Dictionary<string, CacheItem>>(inFile);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(GetChecksum(htCacheItems));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static int GetChecksum(Dictionary<string, CacheItem> data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int chk = data.Count;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            chk += item.Key.GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine                + item.Value.AnotherNumber + item.Value.Id;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var subItem in item.Value.Data.Values)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                chk += subItem.Key.GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine                    + subItem.Value.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return chk;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static string NextString(this Random random)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const string alphabet = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789 ";Di2015NewLine        int len = random.Next(4, 10);Di2015NewLine        char[] buffer = new char[len];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            buffer[i] = alphabet[random.Next(0, alphabet.Length)];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new string(buffer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1148861Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.NetworkInformation;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Examples.System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class PingExampleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // args[0] can be an IPaddress or host name.Di2015NewLine        public static void Main (string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Ping pingSender = new Ping ();Di2015NewLine            PingOptions options = new PingOptions ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Use the default Ttl value which is 128,Di2015NewLine            // but change the fragmentation behavior.Di2015NewLine            options.DontFragment = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create a buffer of 32 bytes of data to be transmitted.Di2015NewLine            string data = "aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa";Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes (data);Di2015NewLine            int timeout = 120;Di2015NewLine            PingReply reply = pingSender.Send (args[0], timeout, buffer, options);Di2015NewLine            if (reply.Status == IPStatus.Success)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine ("Address: {0}", reply.Address.ToString ());Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine ("RoundTrip time: {0}", reply.RoundtripTime);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine ("Time to live: {0}", reply.Options.Ttl);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine ("Don't fragment: {0}", reply.Options.DontFragment);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine ("Buffer size: {0}", reply.Buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1148861Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel; Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace GetIpNetTableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   class ProgramDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // The max number of physical addresses.Di2015NewLine      const int MAXLEN_PHYSADDR = 8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Define the MIB_IPNETROW structure.Di2015NewLine      [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine      struct MIB_IPNETROWDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U4)]Di2015NewLine         public int dwIndex;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U4)]Di2015NewLine         public int dwPhysAddrLen;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)]Di2015NewLine         public byte mac0;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)]Di2015NewLine         public byte mac1;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)]Di2015NewLine         public byte mac2;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)]Di2015NewLine         public byte mac3;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)]Di2015NewLine         public byte mac4;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)]Di2015NewLine         public byte mac5;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)]Di2015NewLine         public byte mac6;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)]Di2015NewLine         public byte mac7;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U4)]Di2015NewLine         public int dwAddr;Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U4)]Di2015NewLine         public int dwType;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Declare the GetIpNetTable function.Di2015NewLine      [DllImport("IpHlpApi.dll")]Di2015NewLine      [return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U4)]Di2015NewLine      static extern int GetIpNetTable(Di2015NewLine         IntPtr pIpNetTable,Di2015NewLine         [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U4)]Di2015NewLine         ref int pdwSize,Di2015NewLine         bool bOrder);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      [DllImport("IpHlpApi.dll", SetLastError = true, CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLine      internal static extern int FreeMibTable(IntPtr plpNetTable);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // The insufficient buffer error.Di2015NewLine      const int ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER = 122;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // The number of bytes needed.Di2015NewLine         int bytesNeeded = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // The result from the API call.Di2015NewLine         int result = GetIpNetTable(IntPtr.Zero, ref bytesNeeded, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Call the function, expecting an insufficient buffer.Di2015NewLine         if (result != ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_BUFFER)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            // Throw an exception.Di2015NewLine            throw new Win32Exception(result);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Allocate the memory, do it in a try/finally block, to ensureDi2015NewLine         // that it is released.Di2015NewLine         IntPtr buffer = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Try/finally.Di2015NewLine         tryDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            // Allocate the memory.Di2015NewLine            buffer = Marshal.AllocCoTaskMem(bytesNeeded);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Make the call again. If it did not succeed, thenDi2015NewLine            // raise an error.Di2015NewLine            result = GetIpNetTable(buffer, ref bytesNeeded, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If the result is not 0 (no error), then throw an exception.Di2015NewLine            if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               // Throw an exception.Di2015NewLine               throw new Win32Exception(result);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Now we have the buffer, we have to marshal it. We can readDi2015NewLine            // the first 4 bytes to get the length of the buffer.Di2015NewLine            int entries = Marshal.ReadInt32(buffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Increment the memory pointer by the size of the int.Di2015NewLine            IntPtr currentBuffer = new IntPtr(buffer.ToInt64() +Di2015NewLine               Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(int)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Allocate an array of entries.Di2015NewLine            MIB_IPNETROW[] table = new MIB_IPNETROW[entries];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Cycle through the entries.Di2015NewLine            for (int index = 0; index < entries; index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               // Call PtrToStructure, getting the structure information.Di2015NewLine               table[index] = (MIB_IPNETROW) Marshal.PtrToStructure(newDi2015NewLine                  IntPtr(currentBuffer.ToInt64() + (index *Di2015NewLine                  Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(MIB_IPNETROW)))), typeof(MIB_IPNETROW));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int index = 0; index < entries; index++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               MIB_IPNETROW row = table[index];Di2015NewLine               IPAddress ip=new IPAddress(BitConverter.GetBytes(row.dwAddr));Di2015NewLine               Console.Write("IP:"+ip.ToString()+"\\t\\tMAC:");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               Console.Write( row.mac0.ToString("X2") + '-');Di2015NewLine               Console.Write( row.mac1.ToString("X2") + '-');Di2015NewLine               Console.Write( row.mac2.ToString("X2") + '-');Di2015NewLine               Console.Write( row.mac3.ToString("X2") + '-');Di2015NewLine               Console.Write( row.mac4.ToString("X2") + '-');Di2015NewLine               Console.WriteLine( row.mac5.ToString("X2"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         finallyDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            // Release the memory.Di2015NewLine            FreeMibTable(buffer);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1148894Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Node Duplicate(Node n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // handle the degenerate case of an empty listDi2015NewLine        if (n == null) {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create the head node, keeping it for later returnDi2015NewLine        Node first = new Node();Di2015NewLine        first.Data = n.Data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // the 'temp' pointer points to the current "last" node in the new listDi2015NewLine        Node temp = first;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        n = n.Next;Di2015NewLine        while (n != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Node n2 = new Node();Di2015NewLine            n2.Data = n.Data;Di2015NewLine            // modify the Next pointer of the last node to point to the new last nodeDi2015NewLine            temp.Next = n2;Di2015NewLine            temp = n2;Di2015NewLine            n = n.Next;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return first;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

1150315Di2015UniqueSeparatorstruct MyStructDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /* ... some stuff ... */Di2015NewLine    int numChilds;Di2015NewLine    IntPtr childData;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<MyStruct> ChildrenDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int elementSize = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(MyStruct));Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < this.numChilds; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IntPtr data = new IntPtr(this.childData.ToInt64() + elementSize * i);Di2015NewLine                MyStruct child = (MyStruct)Marshal.PtrToStructure(data, typeof(MyStruct));Di2015NewLine                yield return child;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1155549Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<FieldInfo> GetAllFields(Type t)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (t == null)Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Empty<FieldInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BindingFlags flags = BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | Di2015NewLine                         BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Instance | Di2015NewLine                         BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly;Di2015NewLine    return t.GetFields(flags).Concat(GetAllFields(t.BaseType));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
1155668Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable
1155668Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<T>
1155668Di2015UniqueSeparatorCast<T>()
1155668Di2015UniqueSeparatorIList
1155668Di2015UniqueSeparatorIList<T>
1155668Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int Count(this IEnumerable sequence)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (sequence == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("sequence");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Optimisation: won't optimise for collections whichDi2015NewLine    // implement ICollection<T> but not ICollection, admittedly.Di2015NewLine    ICollection collection = sequence as ICollection;Di2015NewLine    if (collection != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return collection.Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerator iterator = sequence.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int count = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Don't bother accessing Current - that might boxDi2015NewLine            // a value, and we don't need it anywayDi2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IDisposable disposable = iterator as IDisposable;Di2015NewLine        if (disposable != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            disposable.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

1157437Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ChangeAppConfigDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyConfigSetting.CustomerName = "MyCustomer";Di2015NewLine            MyConfigSetting.EmailAddress = "MyCustomer@Company.com";Di2015NewLine            MyConfigSetting.TimeStamp = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            MyConfigSetting.Save();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Note: This is a proof-of-concept sample and Di2015NewLine    //should not be used in production as it is.  Di2015NewLine    // For example, this is not thread-safe. Di2015NewLine    public class MyConfigSettingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static string _CustomerName;Di2015NewLine        public static string CustomerNameDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _CustomerName; }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _CustomerName = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string _EmailAddress;Di2015NewLine        public static string EmailAddressDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _EmailAddress; }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _EmailAddress = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static DateTime _TimeStamp;Di2015NewLine        public static DateTime TimeStampDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _TimeStamp; }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _TimeStamp = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Save()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            XElement myAppConfigFile = XElement.Load(Utility.GetConfigFileName());Di2015NewLine            var mySetting = (from p in myAppConfigFile.Elements("MySettings")Di2015NewLine                            select p).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine            mySetting.Attribute("CustomerName").Value = CustomerName;Di2015NewLine            mySetting.Attribute("EmailAddress").Value = EmailAddress;Di2015NewLine            mySetting.Attribute("TimeStamp").Value = TimeStamp.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            myAppConfigFile.Save(Utility.GetConfigFileName());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class UtilityDi2015NewLine    {        Di2015NewLine        //Note: This is a proof-of-concept and very naive code. Di2015NewLine        //Shouldn't be used in production as it is. Di2015NewLine        //For example, no null reference checking, no file existence checking and etc. Di2015NewLine        public static string GetConfigFileName()Di2015NewLine        {            Di2015NewLine            const string STR_Vshostexe = ".vshost.exe";Di2015NewLine            string appName = Environment.GetCommandLineArgs()[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //In case this is running under debugger. Di2015NewLine            if (appName.EndsWith(STR_Vshostexe))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                appName = appName.Remove(appName.LastIndexOf(STR_Vshostexe), STR_Vshostexe.Length) + ".exe";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return appName + ".config";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
